original: 02058 āyuḥ kṣayād vā doṣe tu kevale na asty asādhyatā

original: 02063 sataś ced āśrayo na asyāḥ sthātur avyatirekataḥ

original: 02067 tathā utpatteḥ sahetutvād āśrayo ayuktam anyathā

original: 02069 etena samavāyaś ca samavāyī ca kāraṇam

original: 02069 vyavasthitatvaṃ jāty-ādern nirastam anapāśrayāt

original: 02070 parato bhāva-nāśaś cet tasya kiṃ sthiti-hetunā

original: 02073 buddhi-vyāpāra-bhedena nirhrāsa-atiśayāv api
02073 prajñā-āder bhavato deha-nirhrāsa-atiśayau vinā

original: 02096 syād anartha-antara-arthatve apy akarma-adravya-śabda-vat

original: 02097 saṃkhyā-ādi-tadvataḥ śabdais tad-dharma-antara-bhedakam
02098 śrutis tan-mātra-jijñāsor na vā kṣipta-akhilā parā

original: 02100 rūpa-ādi-śakti-bhedānām anākṣepeṇa vartate

02101 ato na rūpaṃ ghaṭa ity eka-adhikaraṇā śrutiḥ
analyzed: atas na rūpam ghaṭaḥ iti eka adhikaraṇā śrutiḥ

02109 tad hetus tādṛśo na asti sati vā anekatā dhruvam
analyzed: tad hetuḥ tādṛśaḥ na asti sati vā anekatā dhruvam

02110 ekasya api na vaikalye syān manda-śvasita-ādiṣu
analyzed: ekasya api na vaikalye syāt manda śvasita ādiṣu

original: 02111 atha hetur yathābhāvaṃ jñāne api syād viśiṣṭatā
analyzed: atha hetuḥ yathābhāvam jñāne api syāt viśiṣṭa tā

original: 02111 na hi tat tasya kāryaṃ yady asya bhedān na bhidyate
analyzed: na hi tat tasya kāryam yadi asya bhedāt na bhidyate

original: 02112 vijñānaṃ śakti-niyamād ekam ekasya kāraṇam

original: 02112 anya-artha-asakti-viguṇe jñāne anartha-antara-grahāt
analyzed: anya artha asakti viguṇe jñāne anartha antara grahāt

original: 02113 śarīrāt sakṛd utpannā dhīḥ sva-jātyā niyamyate
analyzed: śarīrāt sakṛt utpannā dhīḥ sva jātyā niyamyate

original: 02113 parataś cet samarthasya dehasya viratiḥ kutaḥ
analyzed: paratas ced samarthasya dehasya viratiḥ kutas

original: 02114 anāśrayān nivṛtte syāc śarīre cetasaḥ sthitiḥ
analyzed: anāśrayāt nivṛtte syāt śarīre cetasaḥ sthitiḥ

original: 02114 kevalasya iti cec citta-santānaṃ sthiti-kāraṇam
analyzed: kevalasya iti ced citta santānam sthiti kāraṇam

original: 02115 tad-hetu-vṛtti-lābhāya na aṅgatāṃ yadi gacchati
analyzed: tad hetu vṛtti lābhāya na aṅga tām yadi gacchati

original: 02115 hetur deha-antara-utpattau pañca-āyatanam aihikam
02116 tad-aṅga-bhāva-hetutva-niṣedhe anupalambhanam
analyzed: tad aṅga bhāva hetu tva niṣedhe anupalambhanam

original: 02116 aniścayakaraṃ proktam indriya-ādy api śeṣavat
02117 dṛṣṭā ca śaktiḥ pūrveṣām indriyāṇāṃ sva-jātiṣu
analyzed: dṛṣṭā ca śaktiḥ pūrveṣām indriyāṇām sva jātiṣu

original: 02117 vikāra-darśanāt siddham aparāpara-janma ca
analyzed: vikāra darśanāt siddham apara apara janma ca

original: 02118 śarīrād yadi taj-janma prasaṅgaḥ pūrvavad bhavet
analyzed: śarīrāt yadi tat janma prasaṅgaḥ pūrva vat bhavet

original: 02118 cittāc cet tata eva astu janma deha-antarasya ca
analyzed: cittāt ced tatas eva astu janma deha antarasya ca

original: 02119 tasmān na hetu-vaikalyāt sarveṣām antya-cetasām
analyzed: tasmāt na hetu vaikalyāt sarveṣām antya cetasām

original: 02119 asandhir īdṛśaṃ tena śeṣavat sādhanaṃ matam
analyzed: asandhiḥ īdṛśam tena śeṣavat sādhanam matam

original: 02120 abhyāsena viśeṣe api laṅghana-udaka-tāpa-vat
analyzed: abhyāsena viśeṣe api laṅghana audaka tāpa vat

original: 02120 svabhāva-atikramo mā bhūd iti ced āhitaḥ sa cet
analyzed: svabhāva atikramaḥ mā bhūt iti ced āhitaḥ sa ced

original: 02121 punar yatnam apekṣeta yadi syāt asthira-āśrayaḥ
analyzed: punar yatnam apekṣeta yadi syāt asthira āśrayaḥ

original: 02121 viśeṣo na eva bardheta svabhāvaś ca na tādṛśaḥ
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ naḥ eva bardheta svabhāvaḥ ca na tādṛśaḥ

original: 02122 tatra upayukta-śaktīnāṃ viśeṣa-anuttarān prati
analyzed: tatra upayukta śaktīnām viśeṣa anuttarān prati

original: 02122 sādhanānām asāmarthyān nityaṃ ca anāśraya-sthiteḥ
analyzed: sādhanānām asāmarthyāt nityam ca anāśraya sthiteḥ

original: 02123 viśeṣasya asvabhāvatvād vṛddhāv apy āhito yadā
analyzed: viśeṣasya asvabhāva tvāt vṛddhau api āhitaḥ yadā

original: 02123 na apekṣeta punar yatnaṃ yatno anyaḥ syād viśeṣa-kṛt
analyzed: na apekṣeta punar yatnam yatnaḥ anyaḥ syāt viśeṣa kṛt

original: 02124 kāṣṭha-pārada-hema-āder agny-āder iva cetasi
analyzed: kāṣṭha pārada hema ādeḥ agni ādeḥ iva cetasi

original: 02124 abhyāsajāḥ pravartante sva-rasena kṛpā-ādayaḥ
analyzed: abhyāsa jāḥ pravartante svarasena kṛpā ādayaḥ

original: 02125 tasmāt sa teṣām utpannaḥ svabhāvo jāyate guṇaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt sa teṣām utpannaḥ svabhāvaḥ jāyate guṇaḥ

original: 02125 tad-uttarottaro yatno viśeṣasya vidhāyakaḥ
analyzed: tad uttarottaraḥ yatnaḥ viśeṣasya vidhāyakaḥ

original: 02126 yasmāc ca tulya-jātīya-pūrva-bīja-pravṛddhayaḥ
analyzed: yasmāt ca tulya jātīya pūrva bīja pravṛddhayaḥ

original: 02126 kṛpā-ādi-buddhayas tāsāṃ saty abhyāse kutaḥ sthitiḥ
analyzed: kṛpā ādi buddhayaḥ tāsām sati abhyāse kutas sthitiḥ

original: 02127 na ca evaṃ laṅghanād eva laṅghanaṃ bala-yatnayoḥ
analyzed: na ca evam laṅghanāt eva laṅghanam bala yatnayoḥ

original: 02127 tad-hetvoḥ sthita-śaktitvāl laṅghanasya sthita-ātmatā
analyzed: tad hetvoḥ sthita śakti tvāt laṅghanasya sthita ātma tā

original: 02128 tasya ādau deha-vaiguṇyāt paścād-vad avilaṅghanaṃ
analyzed: tasya ādau deha vaiguṇyāt paścāt vat avilaṅghanam

original: 02128 śanair yatnena vaiguṇye niraste sva-bale sthitiḥ

original: 02129 kṛpā sva-bīja-prabhavā sva-bīja-prabhavair na cet

original: 02129 vipakṣair bādhyate cet te prayāty atyanta-sātmatām

original: 02130 tathā hi mūlam abhyāsaḥ pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ parasya tu
analyzed: tathā hi mūlam abhyāsaḥ pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ parasya tu

original: 02130 kṛpā-vairāgya-bodha-ādeś citta-dharmasya pāṭave

original: 02131 kṛpā-ātmakatvam abhyāsād ghṛṇā-vairāgya-rāga-vat

original: 02131 niṣpanna-karuṇā-utkarṣa-para-duḥkha-kṣamer itaḥ

original: 02132 dayāvān duḥkha-hāna-artham upāyeṣv abhiyujyate

original: 02132 parokṣa-upeya-tad-hetos tad-ākhyānaṃ hi duṣkaram

original: 02133 yukty-āgamābhyāṃ vimṛśan duḥkha-hetuṃ parīkṣate
analyzed: yukti āgamābhyām vimṛśan duḥkha hetum parīkṣate

original: 02133 tasya anitya-ādi-rūpāṃ ca duḥkhasya eva viśeṣaṇaiḥ

original: 02134 yatas tathā sthite hetau nivṛttir na iti paśyati

original: 02134 phalasya hetor hāna-arthaṃ tad-vipakṣaṃ parīkṣate

original: 02135 sādhyate tad-vipakṣo api heto rūpa-avabodhataḥ

original: 02135 ātma-ātmīya-graha-kṛtaḥ snehaḥ saṃskāra-gocaraḥ

original: 02136 hetur virodhī nairātmya-darśanaṃ tasya bādhakam

original: 02136 bahuśo bahudhā upāyaṃ kālena bahunā asya ca

original: 02137 gacchanty abhyasyatas tatra guṇa-doṣāḥ prakāśatām
analyzed: gacchanti abhyasyataḥ tatra guṇa doṣāḥ prakāśa tām

original: 02137 buddheś ca pāṭavād hetor vāsanātaḥ prahīyate

original: 02138 padārtha-vṛtteḥ khaṅga-āder viśeṣo ayaṃ mahā-muneḥ
analyzed: padārtha vṛtteḥ khaṅga ādeḥ viśeṣaḥ ayam mahā muneḥ

original: 02138 upāya-abhyāsa eva ayaṃ tādarthyāc śāsanaṃ matam

original: 02139 niṣpatteḥ prathamaṃ bhāvād hetur uktam idaṃ dvayam
analyzed: niṣpatteḥ prathamam bhāvāt hetuḥ uktam idam dvayam

original: 02139 hetoḥ prahāṇaṃ tri-guṇaṃ sugatatvam aniśrayāt
analyzed: hetoḥ prahāṇam triguṇam sugata tvam a niśrayāt

original: 02140 duḥkhasya śastaṃ nairātmya-dṛṣṭes tad yuktito api vā

original: 02140 punar āvṛttir ity uktau janma-doṣa-samudbhavau
analyzed: punar āvṛttiḥ iti uktau janma doṣa samudbhavau

original: 02141 ātma-darśana-bījasya hānād apunarāgamaḥ

original: 02142 aśeṣa-hānam abhyāsād ukty-āder doṣa-saṃkṣayaḥ
02143 na ity eke vyatireko asya sandigdha-avyabhicāry ataḥ
analyzed: na iti eke vyatirekaḥ asya sandigdha avyabhicāri atas

original: 02143 akṣayitvaṃ ca doṣāṇāṃ nityatvād anupāyataḥ
analyzed: akṣayi tvam ca doṣāṇām nitya tvāt anupāyataḥ

original: 02144 upāyasya aparijñānād iti vā parikalpayet
analyzed: upāyasya aparijñānāt iti vā parikalpayet

original: 02144 hetumattvād viruddhasya hetor abhyāsataḥ kṣayāt

analyzed: abhyāsāt na yadṛcchātaḥ ahetoḥ janma virodhataḥ

original: 02148 vyabhicārān na vāta-ādi-dharmaḥ prakṛti-saṃkarāt

original: 02148 adoṣaś cet tad-anyo api dharmaḥ kiṃ tasya na īkṣyate

analyzed: na sarva dharmaḥ sarveṣām sama rāga prasaṅgataḥ

original: 02149 rūpa-ādi-vad adoṣaś cet tulyaṃ tatra api codanam

original: 02150 viśeṣe api ca doṣānām aviśeṣād asiddhatā

analyzed: na vikārāt vikāreṇa sarveṣām na ca sarvajāḥ

original: 02151 kāraṇe vardhamāne ca kārya-hānirn na yujyate

original: 02152 tāpa-ādiṣv iva rāga-āder vikāro api sukha-ādi-jaḥ

original: 02152 vaiṣamyajena duḥkhena rāgasya anudbhavo yadi

original: 02153 rāgī viṣam adoṣo api dṛṣṭaḥ sāmye api na aparaḥ

original: 02154 kṣayād asṛk-sruto apy anye na eka-strī-niyato madaḥ

original: 02154 te na ekasyāṃ na tīvraḥ syāt aṅga-rūpa-ādy api iti cet
analyzed: te na ekasyām na tīvraḥ syāt aṅga rūpa ādi api iti ced

original: 02155 na sarveṣām anekāntān na ca apy aniyato bhavet
analyzed: na sarveṣām anekāntāt na ca api aniyataḥ bhavet

original: 02155 aguṇa-grāhiṇo api syād aṅgaṃ so api guṇa-grahaḥ
analyzed: a guṇa grāhiṇaḥ api syāt aṅgam saḥ api guṇa grahaḥ

original: 02156 yadi sarvā guṇa-grāhī syād hetor aviśeṣataḥ

original: 02156 yad avastho mato rāgī na dveṣī syāc ca tādṛśaḥ

original: 02157 tayor asamarūpatvān niyamaś ca atra na īkṣyate
analyzed: tayoḥ asama rūpa tvāt niyamaḥ ca atra na īkṣyate

original: 02157 sajāti-vāsanā-bheda-pratibaddha-pravṛttayaḥ
02158 yasya rāga-ādayas tasya na ete doṣāḥ prasaṅginaḥ
analyzed: yasya rāga ādayaḥ tasya na ete doṣāḥ prasaṅginaḥ

original: 02158 etena bhūta-dharmatvaṃ niṣiddhaṃ niśrayasya ca
analyzed: etena bhūta dharma tvam niṣiddham niśrayasya ca

original: 02159 niṣedhān na pṛthivy-ādi-niśritā dhavalā-ādayaḥ

original: 02159 tad-upādāya śabdaś ca hetv-arthaḥ svāśrayeṇa ca

original: 02160 avinirbhāga-vartitvād āśrayā ayuktam anyathā
analyzed: a vinirbhāga varti tvāt āśrayāḥ ayuktam anyathā

original: 02160 mada-ādi-śakter iva ced vinirbhāgo na vastunaḥ
analyzed: mada ādi śakteḥ iva ced vinirbhāgaḥ na vastunaḥ

original: 02161 śaktir artha-antaraṃ vastu naśyen na āśritam āśraye

original: 02161 tiṣṭhaty avikale yāti tat-tulyaṃ cen na bhedataḥ

original: 02162 āvikāraṃ ca kāyasya tulya-rūpaṃ bhaven manaḥ
analyzed: āvikāram ca kāyasya tulya rūpam bhavet manaḥ

original: 02163 rūpa-ādi-vad vikalpasya kā eva artha-paratantratā

original: 02163 anapekṣya yadā kāyaṃ vāsanā-bodha-kāraṇam
analyzed: an apekṣya yadā kāyam vāsanā bodha kāraṇam

original: 02164 jñānaṃ syāt kasyacit kiṃcit kadācit tena kiṃcana
analyzed: jñānam syāt kasyacid kiṃcid kadācid tena kiṃcana

original: 02164 avijñānasya vijñāna-anupādānāc ca sidhyati
analyzed: a vijñānasya vijñāna anupādānāt ca sidhyati

original: 02165 vijñāna-śakti-sambandhād iṣṭaś cet sarva-vastunaḥ
analyzed: vijñāna śakti sambandhāt iṣṭaḥ ced sarva vastunaḥ

original: 02165 etat sāṃkhya-paśoḥ ko anyaḥ salajjo vaktum īhate
analyzed: etat sāṃkhya paśoḥ kaḥ anyaḥ sa lajjaḥ vaktum īhate

original: 02166 adṛṣṭa-pūrvam asti iti tṛṇa-agre kariṇāṃ śatam
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa pūrvam asti iti tṛṇa agre kariṇām śatam

original: 02166 yad rūpaṃ dṛśyatāṃ yātaṃ tad rūpaṃ prāṅ na dṛśyate
analyzed: yat rūpam dṛśyatām yātam tat rūpam prāk na dṛśyate

original: 02167 śatadhā viprakīrṇe api hetau tad vidyate katham
analyzed: śatadhā viprakīrṇe api hetau tat vidyate katham

original: 02167 rāga-ādy-aniyamo apūrva-prādurbhāve prasajyate

original: 02168 bhūta-ātmatā-anatikrānteḥ sarvo rāga-ādimān yadi
analyzed: bhūta ātma tā anatikrānteḥ sarvaḥ rāga ādimān yadi

original: 02168 sarvaḥ samāna-rāgaḥ syād bhūta-atiśayato na cet

original: 02169 bhūtānāṃ prāṇitā-bhede apy ayaṃ bhedo yad āśrayaḥ
analyzed: bhūtānām prāṇitā bhede api ayam bhedaḥ yat āśrayaḥ

original: 02169 tan nirhrāsa-atiśaya-vat tad-bhāvāt tāni hāpayet
analyzed: tat nirhrāsa atiśayavat tad bhāvāt tāni hāpayet

original: 02170 na ced bhede api rāga-ādi-hetu-tulya-ātmatā-akṣayaḥ
analyzed: na ced bhede api rāga ādi hetu tulya ātma tā akṣayaḥ

original: 02170 sarvatra rāgaḥ sadṛśaḥ syād hetoḥ sadṛśā-ātmanaḥ
analyzed: sarvatra rāgaḥ sadṛśaḥ syāt hetoḥ sadṛśāḥ ātmanaḥ

original: 02171 na hi go-pratyayasya asti samāna-artha-bhuvaḥ kvacit
analyzed: na hi go pratyayasya asti samāna artha bhuvaḥ kvacid

original: 02171 tāratamyaṃ pṛthivy-ādau prāṇitā-āder iha api vā
analyzed: tāratamyam pṛthivī ādau prāṇi tā ādeḥ iha api vā

original: 02172 auṣṇyasya tāratamye api na anuṣṇo agniḥ kadācana
analyzed: auṣṇyasya tāratamye api na anuṣṇaḥ agniḥ kadācana

original: 02172 tathā iha api iti cen na agner auṣṇyād bheda-niṣedhataḥ
analyzed: tathā iha api iti ced na agneḥ auṣṇyāt bheda niṣedhataḥ

original: 02173 tāratamya-anubhavino yasya anyasya sato guṇāḥ
analyzed: tāratamya anubhavinaḥ yasya anyasya sataḥ guṇāḥ

original: 02173 te kvacit pratihanyante tad-bhede dhavalā-ādi-vat
analyzed: te kvacid pratihanyante tad bhede

analyzed: rūpa ādi vat na niyamaḥ teṣām bhūta avibhāgataḥ

original: 02174 tat-tulyaṃ cen na rāga-ādeḥ saha-utpatti-prasaṅgataḥ

original: 02175 vikalpya-viṣayatvāc ca viṣayā na niyāmakāḥ

original: 02175 sabhāga-hetu-virahād rāga-āder niyamo na vā

original: 02176 sarvadā sarva-buddhīnāṃ janma vā hetu-saṃnidheḥ
analyzed: sarvadā sarva buddhīnām janma vā hetu saṃnidheḥ

original: 02176 kadācid upalambhāt tad adhruvaṃ doṣa-niśrayāt
analyzed: kadācid upalambhāt tat adhruvam doṣa niśrayāt

analyzed: duḥkham hetu vaśa tvāt ca na ca ātmā na api adhiṣṭhitam

original: 02177 na akāraṇam adhiṣṭhātā nityaṃ vā janakaṃ katham
analyzed: na akāraṇam adhiṣṭhātā nityam vā janakam katham

original: 02178 tasmād anekam ekasmād bhinna-kālaṃ na jāyate

original: 02178 kārya-anutpādato anyeṣu saṃgateṣv api hetuṣu

original: 02179 hetv-antara-anumānaṃ syān na etan nityeṣu vidyate

original: 02179 kādācitkatayā siddhā duḥkhasya asya sahetutā

original: 02180 nityaṃ sattvam asattvaṃ vā ahetor anya-anapekṣaṇāt

original: 02180 taikṣṇya-ādīnāṃ yathā na asti kāraṇaṃ kaṇḍaka-ādiṣu
analyzed: taikṣṇya ādīnām yathā na asti kāraṇam kaṇḍaka ādiṣu

original: 02181 tathā akāraṇam etat syād iti kecit pracakṣate
analyzed: tathā akāraṇam etat syāt iti kecid pracakṣate

original: 02181 saty eva yasmin yaj janma vikāre vā api vikriyā
analyzed: sati eva yasmin yat janma vikāre vā api vikriyā

analyzed: sparśasya rūpa hetu tvāt darśane asti nimitta tā

original: 02183 asāmarthyād ato hetur bhava-vāñchā-parigrahaḥ

analyzed: sā bhava ecchā āpti anāpti icchoḥ pravṛttiḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: 02185 yato api prāṇinaḥ kāma-vibhava-icche ca te mate
analyzed: yatas api prāṇinaḥ kāma vibhava aicche ca te mate

original: 02185 sarvatra ca ātma-snehasya hetutvāt sampravartate
analyzed: sarvatra ca ātma snehasya hetu tvāt sampravartate

original: 02186 asukhe sukha-saṃjñasya tasmāt tṛṣṇā bhava-āśrayaḥ
analyzed: asukhe sukha saṃjñasya tasmāt tṛṣṇā bhava āśrayaḥ

original: 02186 virakta-janma-adṛṣṭer ity ācāryāḥ sampracakṣate

original: 02187 adeha-rāga-adṛṣṭeś ca dehād rāga-samudbhavaḥ

original: 02187 nimitta-upagamād iṣṭam upādānaṃ tu vāryate

original: 02188 imān tu yuktiman vicchan bādhate sva-mataṃ svayam

original: 02188 janmanā sahabhāvaś cet jātānāṃ rāga-darśanāt
analyzed: janmanā sahabhāvaḥ ced jātānām rāga darśanāt

original: 02189 sabhāga-jāteḥ prāk siddhiḥ kāraṇatve api na uditam

original: 02189 ajñānam uktā tṛṣṇā eva santāna-preraṇād bhave

original: 02190 ānantaryān na karma api sati tasminn asambhavāt

original: 02190 tad anātyantikaṃ hetoḥ pratibandha-ādi-sambhavāt

original: 02191 saṃsāritvād anirmokṣo na iṣṭatvād aprasiddhitaḥ

original: 02191 yāvad ātmani na premṇo hāniḥ sa paritasyati

original: 02192 mithyā-adhyāropa-hāna-arthaṃ yatno asaty api moktari

original: 02193 avasthā-vīta-rāgāṇāṃ dayayā karmaṇā api vā

original: 02193 ākṣipte avinivṛtti-iṣṭeḥ sahakāri-kṣayād alam

original: 02194 na ākṣeptum aparaṃ karma bhava-tṛṣṇā-vilaṅghinām

original: 02194 duḥkha-jñāne aviruddhasya pūrva-saṃskāra-vāhinī

original: 02195 vastu-dharma-udaya-utpattir na sā sattva-anurodhinī

original: 02195 ātma-antara-samāropād rāgo dharme atad-ātmake

original: 02196 duḥkha-santāna-saṃsparśa-mātreṇa eva dayā-udayaḥ
02196 mohaś ca mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ sa ca sattva-graho vinā

original: 02197 na amuktiḥ pūrva-saṃskāra-kṣaye anya-apratisandhitaḥ

original: 02198 akṣīṇa-śaktiḥ saṃskāro yeṣāṃ tiṣṭhanti te anaghāḥ
analyzed: a kṣīṇa śaktiḥ saṃskāraḥ yeṣām tiṣṭhanti te anaghāḥ

original: 02198 mandatvāt karuṇāyāś ca na yatnaḥ sthāpane mahān

original: 02199 tiṣṭhanty eva para-adhīnāḥ yeṣāṃ tu mahatī kṛpā

original: 02199 satkāyadṛṣṭer vigamād ādya eva abhavo bhavet

original: 02200 mārge cet sahaja-ahāner na hānau vā bhavaḥ kutaḥ

original: 02200 sukhī bhave ayaṃ duḥkhī vā mā bhūvam iti tṛṣyataḥ

original: 02201 yā eva aham iti dhīḥ sā eva sahajaṃ sattva-darśanam

original: 02201 na hy apaśyann aham iti snihyaty ātmani kaścana

analyzed: duḥkha autpādasya hetu tvam bandho nityasya tat kutas

02203 anityatvena yo avācyaḥ sa heturn na hi kasyacit

original: 02206 viṣaya-grahaṇaṃ dharmo vijñānasya yathā asti saḥ

original: 02211 na bādhā yatnavattve api buddhes tat pakṣa-pātataḥ

original: 02212 rāga-pratighayor bādhā bhede api na parasparam

02214 vyākhyeyo atra virodho yas tad-virodhāc ca tanmayaiḥ

original: 02217 sa ātmatvena anapāyatvād anekāntāc ca bhasma-vat

original: 02218 snehāt sukheṣu tṛṣyati tṛṣṇā doṣāṃs tiraskurute

original: 02218 guṇa-darśī paritṛṣyan mama iti tat sādhanāny upādatte

original: 02219 tena ātma-abhiniveśo yāvat tāvat sa saṃsāre

original: 02221 snehaḥ sadoṣa iti cet tataḥ kiṃ tasya varjanam

original: 02222 adūṣite asya viṣaye na śakyaṃ tasya varjanam
analyzed: a dūṣite asya viṣaye na śakyam tasya varjanam

original: 02222 prahāṇir icchā-dveṣa-āder guṇa-doṣa-anubandhinaḥ
02223 tayor adṛṣṭir viṣaye na tu bāhyeṣu yaḥ kramaḥ

original: 02223 na hi sneha-guṇāt snehaḥ kiṃ tv artha-guṇa-darśanāt

original: 02224 kāraṇe avikale tasmin kāryaṃ kena nivāryate

original: 02224 kā vā sadoṣatā dṛṣṭā snehe duḥkha-samāśrayaḥ
analyzed: kā vā sa doṣa tā dṛṣṭā snehe duḥkha samāśrayaḥ

original: 02225 tathā api na virāgo atra svatva-dṛṣṭer yathā ātmani

original: 02225 na tair vinā duḥkha-hetur ātmā cet te api tādṛśāḥ

original: 02226 nirdoṣaṃ dvayam apy evaṃ vairāgyaṃ na dvayos tataḥ

original: 02227 ātmīya-buddhi-hānyā atra tyāgo na tu viparyaye

original: 02227 upabhoga-āśrayatvena gṛhīteṣv indriya-ādiṣu
analyzed: upabhoga āśraya tvena gṛhīteṣu indriya ādiṣu

original: 02228 svatva-dhīḥ kena vāryeta vairāgyaṃ tatra tat kutaḥ

original: 02228 pratyakṣam eva sarvasya keśa-ādiṣu kalevarāt

original: 02229 cyuteṣu sā ghṛṇā buddhir jāyate anyatra saspṛhā
analyzed: cyuteṣu sā ghṛṇā buddhiḥ jāyate anyatra sa spṛhā

original: 02229 samavāya-ādi-sambandha-janitā tatra hi sva-dhīḥ
analyzed: samavāya ādi sambandha janitā tatra hi sva dhīḥ

original: 02230 sambandhaḥ sa tathā eva iti dṛṣṭāv api na hīyate
analyzed: sambandhaḥ sa tathā eva iti dṛṣṭau api na hīyate

original: 02230 samavāya-ādy-abhāve api sarvatra asty upakāritā
analyzed: samavāya ādi abhāve api sarvatra asti upakāri tā

original: 02231 duḥkha-upakārān na bhaved aṅgulyām iva cet sva-dhīḥ
analyzed: duḥkha aupakārāt na bhavet aṅgulyām iva ced sva dhīḥ

original: 02231 na hy ekāntena tad duḥkhaṃ bhūyasā saviṣa-anna-vat
analyzed: na hi ekāntena tat duḥkham bhūyasā sa viṣa anna vat

original: 02232 viśiṣṭa-sukha-saṃgāt syāt tad-viruddhe virāgitā
analyzed: viśiṣṭa sukha saṃgāt syāt tad viruddhe virāgi tā

original: 02232 kiṃcit parityajet saukhyaṃ viśiṣṭa-sukha-tṛṣṇayā
analyzed: kiṃcid parityajet saukhyam viśiṣṭa sukha tṛṣṇayā

original: 02233 nairātmye tu yathālābham ātma-snehāt pravartate
analyzed: nairātmye tu yathālābham ātma snehāt pravartate

original: 02237 vṛttimān pratibadhnāti tad doṣān saṃvṛnoti ca

02285 vyāpti-pradarśanād hetoḥ sādhyena uktaṃ ca tat sphuṭam

original: 03001 mānaṃ dvividhaṃ meya-dvaividhyāt śakty-aśaktitaḥ
03001 arthakriyāyāṃ keśa-ādirn na artho anartha-adhimokṣataḥ
analyzed: arthakriyāyām keśa ādiḥ na arthaḥ anartha adhimokṣataḥ

original: 03002 sadṛśa-asadṛśatvāc ca viṣaya-aviṣayatvataḥ

original: 03002 śabdasya anya-nimittānāṃ bhāve dhīḥ sad-asattvataḥ

analyzed: jñāna rūpa tayā artha tve sāmānye ced prasajyate

original: 03010 tathā-iṣṭatvād adoṣo artha-rūpatvena samānatā
analyzed: tathā a iṣṭa tvāt adoṣaḥ artha rūpa tvena samāna tā

original: 03010 sarvatra sama-rūpatvāt tad-vyāvṛtti-samāśrayāt
analyzed: sarvatra sama rūpa tvāt tad vyāvṛtti samāśrayāt

original: 03011 tad avastv-abhidheyatvāt sāphalyād akṣa-saṃhateḥ
analyzed: tat avastu abhidheya tvāt sāphalyāt akṣa saṃhateḥ

original: 03011 nāma-ādi-vacane vaktṛ-śrotṛ-vācya-anubandhini
analyzed: nāma ādi vacane vaktṛ śrotṛ vācya anubandhini

original: 03012 asambandhini nāma-ādāv arthe syād apravartanam
analyzed: asambandhini nāma ādau arthe syāt a pravartanam

original: 03012 sārūpyād bhrāntito vṛttir arthe cet syān na sarvadā
analyzed: sārūpyāt bhrāntitaḥ vṛttiḥ arthe ced syāt na sarvadā

original: 03013 deśa-bhrāntiś ca na jñāne tulyam utpattito dhiyaḥ
analyzed: deśa bhrāntiḥ ca na jñāne tulyam utpattitaḥ dhiyaḥ

original: 03013 tathāvidhāyāḥ anyatra tatra anupagamād dhiyaḥ
analyzed: tathāvidhāyāḥ anyatra tatra anupagamāt dhiyaḥ

original: 03014 bāhya-artha-pratibhāsāyā upāye vā apramāṇatā
analyzed: bāhya artha pratibhāsāyāḥ upāye vā apramāṇa tā

original: 03014 vijñāna-vyatiriktasya vyatireka-aprasiddhitaḥ
analyzed: vijñāna vyatiriktasya vyatireka aprasiddhitaḥ

original: 03015 sarva-jñāna-arthavattvāc cet svapna-ādāv anyathā īkṣaṇāt
analyzed: sarva jñāna arthavat tvāt ced svapna ādau anyathā īkṣaṇāt

original: 03015 ayuktaṃ na ca saṃskārān nīla-ādi-pratibhāsataḥ
analyzed: ayuktam na ca saṃskārāt nīla ādi pratibhāsataḥ

original: 03016 nīla-ādy-apratighātān na jñānaṃ tad-yogya-deśakaiḥ
03016 ajñātasya svayaṃ jñānān nāma-ādy etena varṇitaḥ
analyzed: ajñātasya svayam jñānāt nāma ādi etena varṇitaḥ

original: 03017 sā eva iṣṭa-arthavatī kena cakṣur-ādi-matir matā
analyzed: sā eva iṣṭa arthavatī kena cakṣuḥ ādi matiḥ matā

original: 03017 artha-sāmarthya-dṛṣṭeś ced anyat prāptam anarthakam
analyzed: artha sāmarthya dṛṣṭeḥ ced anyat prāptam anarthakam

original: 03018 apravṛttir asambandhe apy artha-sambandha-vad yadi
analyzed: apravṛttiḥ asambandhe api artha sambandha vat yadi

original: 03018 atīta-anāgataṃ vācyaṃ na syād arthena tat kṣayāt
analyzed: atīta anāgatam vācyam na syāt arthena tat kṣayāt

original: 03019 sāmānya-grahaṇāc śabdād aprasaṅgo mato yadi
analyzed: sāmānya grahaṇāt śabdāt aprasaṅgaḥ mataḥ yadi

original: 03019 tan na kevala-sāmānya-agrahaṇād grahaṇe api vā
analyzed: tat na kevala sāmānya agrahaṇāt grahaṇe api vā

original: 03020 atat-samānatā avyaktī tena nitya-upalambhanam
03020 nityatvāc ca yadi vyaktir vyakteḥ pratyakṣatāṃ prati
analyzed: nitya tvāt ca yadi vyaktiḥ vyakteḥ pratyakṣa tām prati

original: 03021 ātmani jñāna-janane yac śaktaṃ śaktam eva tat
analyzed: ātmani jñāna janane yat śaktam śaktam eva tat

original: 03021 atha aśaktaṃ kadācic ced aśaktaṃ sarvadā eva tat
analyzed: atha aśaktam kadācid ced aśaktam sarvadā eva tat

original: 03022 tasya śaktir aśaktir vā yā svabhāvena saṃsthitā
analyzed: tasya śaktiḥ aśaktiḥ vā yā svabhāvena saṃsthitā

original: 03022 nityatvād acikitsyasya kas tāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ
analyzed: nitya tvāt acikitsyasya kaḥ tām kṣapayitum kṣamaḥ

original: 03023 tac ca sāmānya-vijñānam anubandhan vibhāvyate
analyzed: tat ca sāmānya vijñānam vibhāvyate

original: 03023 nīla-ādy-ākāra-leśo yaḥ sa tasmin kena nirmitaḥ
analyzed: nīla ādi ākāra leśaḥ yaḥ sa tasmin kena nirmitaḥ

original: 03024 pratyakṣa-pratyaya-arthatvān na akṣāṇāṃ vyarthatā iti cet
analyzed: pratyakṣa pratyaya artha tvāt na akṣāṇām vyartha tā iti ced

original: 03024 sā eva eka-rūpāc śabda-āder bhinna-ābhāsā matiḥ kutaḥ
analyzed: sā eva eka rūpāt śabda ādeḥ bhinna ābhāsā matiḥ kutas

original: 03025 na jātir jātimad vyakti-rūpaṃ yena apara-āśrayam
analyzed: na jātiḥ jātimat vyakti rūpam yena apara āśrayam

original: 03025 siddhaṃ pṛthak cet kāryatvaṃ hy apekṣā ity abhidhīyate
analyzed: siddham pṛthak ced kārya tvam hi apekṣā iti abhidhīyate

original: 03026 niṣpatter apara-adhīnam api kāryaṃ sva-hetutaḥ
analyzed: niṣpatteḥ apara adhīnam api kāryam sva hetutaḥ

original: 03026 sambadhyate kalpanayā kim akāryaṃ kathaṃcana
analyzed: sambadhyate kalpanayā kim akāryam kathaṃcana

original: 03027 anyatve tad asambaddhaṃ siddhā ato niḥsvabhāvatā
03027 jāti-prasaṅgo abhāvasya na apekṣā abhāvatas tayoḥ
analyzed: jāti prasaṅgaḥ abhāvasya na apekṣā abhāvataḥ tayoḥ

original: 03028 tasmād arūpā rūpāṇām āśrayeṇa upakalpitā
analyzed: tasmāt arūpā rūpāṇām āśrayeṇa upakalpitā

original: 03028 tad-viśeṣa-avagāha-arthair jātiḥ śabdaiḥ prakāśyate
analyzed: tad viśeṣa avagāha arthaiḥ jātiḥ śabdaiḥ prakāśyate

original: 03029 tasyāṃ rūpa-avabhāso yas tattvena arthasya vā grahaḥ
analyzed: tasyām rūpa avabhāsaḥ yaḥ tattvena arthasya vā grahaḥ

original: 03029 bhrāntiḥ sā anādi-kālīna-darśana-abhyāsa-nirmitā
analyzed: bhrāntiḥ sā anādi kālīna darśana abhyāsa nirmitā

original: 03030 arthānāṃ yac ca sāmānyam anya-vyāvṛtti-lakṣaṇam
analyzed: arthānām yat ca sāmānyam anya vyāvṛtti lakṣaṇam

original: 03030 yan niṣṭhās ta ime śabdā na rūpaṃ tasya kiṃcana
analyzed: yat niṣṭhāḥ te ime śabdāḥ na rūpam tasya kiṃcana

original: 03031 sāmānya-buddhau sāmānyena arūpāyām api īkṣaṇāt
analyzed: sāmānya buddhau sāmānyena arūpāyām api īkṣaṇāt

original: 03031 artha-bhrāntir api iṣyeta sāmānyaṃ sā apy abhiplavāt
analyzed: artha bhrāntiḥ api iṣyeta sāmānyam sā api abhiplavāt

original: 03032 artha-rūpatayā tattvena abhāvāc ca na rūpiṇī
analyzed: artha rūpa tayā tattvena abhāvāt ca na rūpiṇī

original: 03032 niḥsvabhāvatayā avācyaṃ kutaścid vacanān matam
analyzed: niḥsvabhāva tayā avācyam kutaścid vacanāt matam

original: 03033 yadi vastu na vastūnām avācyatvaṃ kathaṃcana
analyzed: yadi vastu na vastūnām avācya tvam kathaṃcana

original: 03033 na eva vācyam upādāna-bhedād bheda-upacārataḥ
analyzed: na eva vācyam upādāna bhedāt bheda aupacārataḥ

original: 03034 atīta-anāgate apy arthe sāmānya-vinibandhanāḥ
analyzed: atīta anāgate api arthe sāmānya vinibandhanāḥ

original: 03034 śrutayo niviśante sad-asad-dharmaḥ kathaṃ bhavet
analyzed: śrutayaḥ niviśante sat asat dharmaḥ katham bhavet

original: 03035 upacārāt tad iṣṭaṃ ced vartamāna-ghaṭasya kā
analyzed: upacārāt tat iṣṭam ced vartamāna ghaṭasya kā

original: 03035 pratyāsattir abhāvena yā paṭa-ādau na vidyate
03036 buddher askhalitā vṛttir mukhya-āropitayoḥ sadā
analyzed: buddheḥ askhalitā vṛttiḥ mukhya āropitayoḥ sadā

original: 03036 siṃhe māṇavake tadvad ghoṣaṇā apy asti laukikī
analyzed: siṃhe māṇavake tadvat ghoṣaṇā api asti laukikī

original: 03037 yatra rūḍhyā asad-artho api janaiḥ śabdo niveśitaḥ
analyzed: yatra rūḍhyā asat arthaḥ api janaiḥ śabdaḥ niveśitaḥ

original: 03037 sa mukhyas tatra tat-sāmyād gauṇo anyatra skhalad gatiḥ
analyzed: sa mukhyaḥ tatra tad sāmyāt gauṇaḥ anyatra skhalat gatiḥ

original: 03038 yathābhāve apy abhāva-ākhyāṃ yathā-kalpanam eva vā
analyzed: yathā abhāve api abhāva ākhyām yathā kalpanam eva vā

original: 03038 kuryād aśakte śakte vā pradhāna-ādi-śrutiṃ janaḥ
analyzed: kuryāt aśakte śakte vā pradhāna ādi śrutim janaḥ

original: 03039 śabdebhyo yādṛśī buddhir naṣṭe anaṣṭe api dṛśyate
analyzed: śabdebhyaḥ yādṛśī buddhiḥ naṣṭe a naṣṭe api dṛśyate

original: 03039 tādṛśy eva sad-arthānāṃ na etac śrotṛ-ādi-cetasām
analyzed: tādṛśī eva sat arthānām na etat śrotṛ ādi cetasām

original: 03040 sāmānya-mātra-grahaṇāt sāmānyaṃ cetasor dvayoḥ
analyzed: sāmānya mātra grahaṇāt sāmānyam cetasoḥ dvayoḥ

original: 03040 tasya api kevalasya prāg grahaṇaṃ vinivāritam
analyzed: tasya api kevalasya prāk grahaṇam vinivāritam

original: 03041 paraspara-viśiṣṭānām aviśiṣṭaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
analyzed: paraspara viśiṣṭānām aviśiṣṭam katham bhavet

original: 03041 rūpaṃ dvirūpatāyāṃ vā tad-vastv ekaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
analyzed: rūpam dvi rūpatāyām vā tat vastu ekam katham bhavet

original: 03042 tābhyāṃ tad-anyad eva syād yadi rūpaṃ samaṃ tayoḥ
analyzed: tābhyām tat anyat eva syāt yadi rūpam samam tayoḥ

original: 03042 tayor iti na sambandho vyāvṛttis tu na duṣyate
analyzed: tayoḥ iti na sambandhaḥ vyāvṛttiḥ tu na duṣyate

original: 03043 tasmāt samānatā eva asmin sāmānye avastu-lakṣaṇam
analyzed: tasmāt samāna tā eva asmin sāmānye avastu lakṣaṇam

original: 03043 kāryaṃ ca tad anekaṃ syān naśvaraṃ ca tan-matam
analyzed: kāryam ca tat anekam syāt naśvaram ca tat matam

original: 03044 vastu-sattā-anubandhitvād vināśasya na nityatā
analyzed: vastu sattā anubandhi tvāt vināśasya na nitya tā

original: 03044 asambandhaś ca jātīnām akāryatvād arūpatā
analyzed: asambandhaḥ ca jātīnām akārya tvāt arūpa tā

original: 03045 yac ca vastu-balāj jñānaṃ jāyate tad apekṣyate
analyzed: yat ca vastu balāt jñānam jāyate tat apekṣyate

original: 03045 na saṃketaṃ na sāmānya-buddhiṣv etad vibhāvyate
analyzed: na saṃketam na sāmānya buddhiṣu etat vibhāvyate

original: 03046 yā apy abheda-anugā buddhiḥ kācid vastu-dvaye kṣaṇe
analyzed: yāḥ api abheda anugā buddhiḥ kācid vastu dvaye kṣaṇe

original: 03046 saṃketena vinā sā artha-pratyāsatti-nibandhanā
analyzed: saṃketena vinā sā artha pratyāsatti nibandhanā

original: 03047 pratyāsattir vinā jātyā yatheṣṭā cakṣur-ādiṣu
analyzed: pratyāsattiḥ vinā jātyā yathā iṣṭā cakṣuḥ ādiṣu

original: 03047 jñāna-kāryeṣu jātir vā yayā anveti vibhāgataḥ
analyzed: jñāna kāryeṣu jātiḥ vā yayā anveti vibhāgataḥ

original: 03048 kathaṃcid api vijñāne tad-rūpa-anavabhāsataḥ
analyzed: kathaṃcid api vijñāne tad rūpa anavabhāsataḥ

original: 03048 yadi nāma indriyāṇāṃ syād draṣṭā bhāseta tad-vapuḥ
analyzed: yadi nāma indriyāṇām syāt draṣṭā bhāseta tad vapuḥ

original: 03049 rūpavattvāt na jātīnāṃ kevalānām adarśanāt
analyzed: rūpavat tvāt na jātīnām kevalānām adarśanāt

original: 03049 vyakti-grahe ca tac śabda-rūpād anyan na dṛśyate
analyzed: vyakti grahe ca tat śabda rūpāt anyat na dṛśyate

original: 03050 jñāna-mātra-artha-karaṇe apy ayogya-matā eva tat
analyzed: jñāna mātra artha karaṇe api ayogya matā eva tat

original: 03050 tad ayogyatayā arūpaṃ tad hy avastuṣu lakṣaṇam
analyzed: tat ayogya tayā arūpam tat hi avastuṣu lakṣaṇam

original: 03051 yathokta-viparītaṃ yat tat svalakṣaṇam iṣyate
analyzed: yathā ukta viparītam yat tat sva lakṣaṇam iṣyate

original: 03051 sāmānyaṃ trividhaṃ tac ca bhāva-abhāva-ubhaya-āśrayāt
analyzed: ca

original: 03052 yadi bhāva-āśrayaṃ jñānaṃ bhāve bhāva-anubandhataḥ
analyzed: yadi bhāva āśrayam jñānam bhāve bhāva anubandhataḥ

original: 03052 na ukta-uttaratvād dṛṣṭatvād atīta-ādiṣu ca anyathā
analyzed: na ukta auttara tvāt dṛṣṭa tvāt atīta ādiṣu ca anyathā

original: 03053 bhāva-dharmatva-hāniś ced bhāva-grahaṇa-pūrvakam
analyzed: bhāva dharma tva hāniḥ ced bhāva grahaṇa pūrvakam

original: 03053 taj-jñānam ity adoṣo ayaṃ meyaṃ tv ekaṃ svalakṣaṇam
analyzed: tat jñānam iti adoṣaḥ ayam meyam tu ekam sva lakṣaṇam

original: 03054 tasmād arthakriyā-siddheḥ sad-asattā-vicāraṇāt
03054 tasya sva-pararūpābhyāṃ gater meya-dvayaṃ matam
03055 ayathābhiniveśena dvitīyā bhrāntir iṣyate
analyzed: ayathā abhiniveśena dvitīyā bhrāntiḥ iṣyate

original: 03055 gatiś cet pararūpeṇa na ca bhrānteḥ pramāṇatā
analyzed: gatiḥ ced para rūpeṇa na ca bhrānteḥ pramāṇa tā

original: 03056 abhiprāya-avisaṃvādād api bhrānteḥ pramāṇatā
analyzed: abhiprāya avisaṃvādāt api bhrānteḥ pramāṇa tā

original: 03056 gatir apy anyathā dṛṣṭā pakṣaś ca ayaṃ kṛta-uttaraḥ
analyzed: gatiḥ api anyathā dṛṣṭā pakṣaḥ ca ayam kṛtauttaraḥ

original: 03057 maṇi-pradīpa-prabhayor maṇi-buddhyā abhidhāvataḥ
analyzed: maṇi pradīpa prabhayoḥ maṇi buddhyā abhidhāvataḥ

original: 03057 mithyā-jñāna-aviśeṣe api viśeṣo arthakriyāṃ prati
analyzed: mithyā jñāna aviśeṣe api viśeṣaḥ arthakriyām prati

original: 03058 yathā tathā ayathārthatve apy anumāna-tad-ābhayoḥ
analyzed: yathā tathā ayathārtha tve api anumāna tad ābhayoḥ

original: 03058 arthakriyā-anurodhena pramāṇatvaṃ vyavasthitam
analyzed: arthakriyā anurodhena pramāṇa tvam vyavasthitam

original: 03059 buddhir yatra artha-sāmarthyād anvaya-vyatirekiṇī
analyzed: buddhiḥ yatra artha sāmarthyāt anvaya vyatirekiṇī

original: 03059 tasya svatantraṃ grahaṇam ato anyad vastv atīndriyam
analyzed: tasya svatantram grahaṇam atas anyat vastu atīndriyam

original: 03060 tasya adṛṣṭa-ātma-rūpasya gater anyo artha-āśrayaḥ
analyzed: tasya adṛṣṭa ātma rūpasya gateḥ anyaḥ artha āśrayaḥ

original: 03060 tad-āśrayeṇa sambandhī yadi syād gamakas tadā
03061 gamaka-anuga-sāmānya-rūpeṇa eva tadā gatiḥ
analyzed: gamaka anuga sāmānya rūpeṇa eva tadā gatiḥ

original: 03061 tasmāt sarvaḥ parokṣo artho viśeṣeṇa na gamyate
analyzed: tasmāt sarvaḥ parokṣaḥ arthaḥ viśeṣeṇa na gamyate

original: 03062 yā ca sambandhino dharmād gatir dharmiṇi jāyate
analyzed: yā ca sambandhinaḥ dharmāt gatiḥ dharmiṇi jāyate

original: 03062 sā anumānaṃ parokṣāṇām ekaṃ tena eva sādhanam
analyzed: sā anumānam parokṣāṇām ekam tena eva sādhanam

original: 03063 na pratyakṣa-parokṣābhyāṃ meyasya anyasya sambhavaḥ
analyzed: na pratyakṣa parokṣābhyām meyasya anyasya sambhavaḥ

original: 03063 tasmāt prameya-dvitvena pramāṇa-dvitvam iṣyate
analyzed: tasmāt prameya dvi tvena pramāṇa dvi tvam iṣyate

original: 03064 try-eka-saṃkhyā-nirāso vā prameya-dvaya-darśanāt
03064 ekam eva aprameyatvād asataś cen mataṃ ca naḥ
analyzed: ekam eva aprameya tvāt asataḥ ced matam ca naḥ

original: 03065 anekānto aprameyatve asad-bhāvasya api niścayāt
analyzed: anekāntaḥ aprameya tve asadbhāvasya api niścayāt

original: 03065 tan niścaya-pramāṇaṃ vā dvitīyaṃ na akṣajā matiḥ
analyzed: tat niścaya pramāṇam vā dvitīyam na akṣa jā matiḥ

original: 03066 abhāve artha-balāj jāte artha-śakty-anapekṣaṇe
analyzed: abhāve artha balāt jāte artha śakti anapekṣaṇe

original: 03066 vyavadhāna-ādi-bhāve api jāyeta indriyajā matiḥ
analyzed: vyavadhāna ādi bhāve api jāyeta indriya jā matiḥ

original: 03067 abhāve vinivṛttiś cet pratyakṣasya eva niścayaḥ
analyzed: abhāve vinivṛttiḥ ced pratyakṣasya eva niścayaḥ

original: 03067 viruddhaṃ sā eva vā liṅgam anvaya-vyatirekiṇī
analyzed: viruddham sā eva vā liṅgam anvaya vyatirekiṇī

original: 03068 siddhaṃ ca para-caitanya-pratipatteḥ pramā-dvayam
analyzed: siddham ca para caitanya pratipatteḥ pramā dvayam

original: 03068 vyavahāra-ādau pravṛtteś ca siddhas tadbhāva-niścayaḥ
03069 pramāṇam avisaṃvādāt ta kvacid vyabhicārataḥ
analyzed: pramāṇam avisaṃvādāt kvacid vyabhicārataḥ

original: 03069 na āśvāsa iti cel liṅgaṃ durdṛṣṭer atad īdṛśam
analyzed: na āśvāsaḥ iti ced liṅgam durdṛṣṭeḥ a tat īdṛśam

original: 03070 yataḥ kadācit siddhā asya pratītir vastunaḥ kvacit
analyzed: yatas kadācid siddhā asya pratītiḥ vastunaḥ kvacid

original: 03070 tad avaśyaṃ tato jātaṃ tat svabhāvo api vā bhavet
analyzed: tat avaśyam tatas jātam tat svabhāvaḥ api vā bhavet

original: 03071 sva-nimittaṃ svabhāvaṃ vā vinā na arthasya sambhavaḥ
analyzed: sva nimittam svabhāvam vā vinā na arthasya sambhavaḥ

original: 03071 yac ca rūpaṃ tayor dṛṣṭaṃ tad eva anyatra lakṣaṇam
analyzed: yat ca rūpam tayoḥ dṛṣṭam tat eva anyatra lakṣaṇam

original: 03072 svabhāve sva-nimitte vā dṛśye darśana-hetuṣu
analyzed: svabhāve sva nimitte vā dṛśye darśana hetuṣu

original: 03072 anyeṣu satsv adṛśye ca sattā vā tadvataḥ katham
analyzed: anyeṣu satsu adṛśye ca sattā vā tadvataḥ katham

original: 03073 aprāmāṇye ca sāmānya-buddhes tal-lopa āgataḥ
analyzed: aprāmāṇye ca sāmānya buddheḥ tad lopaḥ āgataḥ

original: 03073 pretya-bhāva-vad akṣaiś cet paryāyeṇa pratīyate
analyzed: pretyabhāva vat akṣaiḥ ced paryāyeṇa pratīyate

original: 03074 tac ca na indriya-śakty-ādāv akṣa-buddher asambhavāt
analyzed: tat ca na indriya śakti ādau akṣa buddheḥ asambhavāt

original: 03074 abhāva-pratipattau syād buddhi-janma-animittakam
analyzed: abhāva pratipattau syāt buddhi janma animittakam

original: 03075 svalakṣaṇe ca pratyakṣam avikalpatayā vinā
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇe ca pratyakṣam avikalpa tayā vinā

original: 03075 vikalpena na sāmānya-grahas tasmiṃs tato anumā
analyzed: vikalpena na sāmānya grahaḥ tasmin tatas anumā

original: 03076 prameya-niyame varṇa-anityatā na pratīyate
03076 pramāṇam anyat tad buddhir vinā liṅgena sambhavāt
analyzed: pramāṇam anyat tat buddhiḥ vinā liṅgena sambhavāt

original: 03077 viśeṣa-dṛṣṭe liṅgasya sambandhasya aprasiddhitaḥ
analyzed: viśeṣa dṛṣṭe liṅgasya sambandhasya aprasiddhitaḥ

original: 03077 tat pramāṇa-antaraṃ meya-bahutvād bahutā api vā

original: 03078 pramāṇānām anekasya vṛtter ekatra vā yathā
analyzed: pramāṇānām anekasya vṛtteḥ ekatra vā yathā

original: 03078 viśeṣa-dṛṣṭer eka-tri-saṃkhyā-apoho na vā bhavet

original: 03079 viṣaya-aniyamād anya-prameyasya ca sambhavāt
analyzed: viṣaya aniyamāt anya prameyasya ca sambhavāt

original: 03079 yojanād varṇa-sāmānye na ayaṃ doṣaḥ prasajyeta
analyzed: yojanāt varṇa sāmānye na ayam doṣaḥ prasajyeta

original: 03080 na avastu rūpaṃ tasya eva tathā siddhe prasādhanāt
analyzed: na avastu rūpam tasya eva tathā siddhe prasādhanāt

original: 03080 anyatra na anya-siddhiś cen na tasya eva prasiddhitaḥ

original: 03081 yo hi bhāvo yathābhūto sa tādṛg liṅga-cetasaḥ

original: 03081 hetus tajjā tathābhūte tasmād vastuni liṅgi-dhīḥ

original: 03082 liṅga-liṅgi-dhiyor evaṃ pāraṃparyeṇa vastuni
analyzed: liṅga liṅgi dhiyoḥ evam pāraṃparyeṇa vastuni

original: 03082 pratibandhāt tad-ābhāsa-śūnyayor apy avañcanam
analyzed: pratibandhāt tad ābhāsa śūnyayoḥ api avañcanam

original: 03083 tad-rūpa-adhyavasāyāc ca tayos tad-rūpa-śūnyayoḥ
analyzed: tad rūpa adhyavasāyāt ca tayoḥ tad rūpa śūnyayoḥ

original: 03083 tad-rūpa-avañcakatve api kṛtā bhrānti-vyavasthitiḥ
analyzed: tad rūpa avañcaka tve api kṛtā bhrānti vyavasthitiḥ

original: 03084 tasmād vastuni boddhavye vyāpakaṃ vyāpya-cetasaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt vastuni boddhavye vyāpakam vyāpya cetasaḥ

original: 03084 nimittaṃ tat svabhāvo vā kāraṇaṃ tac ca tad dhiyaḥ
analyzed: nimittam tat svabhāvaḥ vā kāraṇam tat ca tat dhiyaḥ

original: 03085 pratiṣedhas tu sarvatra sādhyate anupalambhataḥ
analyzed: pratiṣedhaḥ tu sarvatra sādhyate anupalambhataḥ

original: 03085 siddhiṃ pramāṇair vadatām arthād eva viparyayāt

original: 03086 niṣedhe yā api tasya eva sā apramāṇatva-sūcanā
analyzed: niṣedhe yā api tasya eva sā apramāṇa tva sūcanā

original: 03087 anyathā ekasya bhāvasya sadbhāva-uktyā parasya tat
03087 na astitvaṃ kena gamyeta virodhāc ced asāv api
analyzed: na astitvam kena gamyeta virodhāt ced asau api

original: 03088 siddhaḥ kena asahasthānād iti cet tat kuto matam
analyzed: siddhaḥ kena asahasthānāt iti ced tat kutas matam

original: 03088 dṛśyasya darśana-abhāvād iti cet sā apramāṇatā
analyzed: dṛśyasya darśana abhāvāt iti ced sā apramāṇa tā

original: 03089 tasmāt sva-śabdena uktā api sā abhāvasya prasādhikā
analyzed: tasmāt sva śabdena uktā api sā abhāvasya prasādhakā

original: 03089 yasyā pramāṇaṃ sā avācyo niṣedhas tena sarvathā
analyzed: pramāṇam sā avācyaḥ niṣedhaḥ tena sarvathā

original: 03090 etena tad-viruddha-artha-kārya-uktir upavarṇitā
03090 prayogaḥ kevalaṃ bhinnaḥ sarvatra artho na bhidyate
analyzed: prayogaḥ kevalam bhinnaḥ sarvatra arthaḥ na bhidyate

original: 03091 viruddhaṃ tac ca sā upāyam avidhāyā api dhāya ca
analyzed: viruddham tat ca sā upāyam avidhāyāḥ api dhāya ca

original: 03091 pramāṇa-uktir niṣedhe yā na sā nyāyānusāriṇī
03092 ukty-ādeḥ sarvavit pretya-bhāva-ādi-pratiṣedha-vat
analyzed: ukti ādeḥ sarva vid pretyabhāva ādi pratiṣedha vat

original: 03092 atīndriyāṇām arthānāṃ virodhasya aprasiddhitaḥ
analyzed: atīndriyāṇām arthānām virodhasya aprasiddhitaḥ

original: 03093 bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ kaḥ syātāṃ yad yukti-saṃvidau
analyzed: bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ kaḥ syātām yat yukti saṃvidau

original: 03093 tādṛśo anupalabdheś ced ucyatāṃ sā eva sādhanam
03094 aniścayakaraṃ proktam īdṛk kva anupalambhanam
analyzed: aniścaya karam proktam īdṛś kva anupalambhanam

original: 03094 tatra atyantaparokṣeṣu sadasattā-viniścayau
analyzed: tatra atyanta parokṣeṣu sat asat tā viniścayau

original: 03095 bhinno abhinno api vā dharmaḥ sa viruddhaḥ prayujyate
analyzed: bhinnaḥ abhinnaḥ api vā dharmaḥ sa viruddhaḥ prayujyate

original: 03095 yathā agnir ahime sādhye sattā vā janma-bādhanī
analyzed: yathā agniḥ ahime sādhye sattā vā janma bādhanī

original: 03096 yathā vastv eva vastūnāṃ sādhane sādhanaṃ matam
analyzed: yathā vastu eva vastūnām sādhane sādhanam matam

original: 03096 tathā vastv eva vastūnāṃ sva-nivṛttau nivartakam
03097 etena kalpanā-nyasto yatra kvacana sambhavād
analyzed: etena kalpanā nyastaḥ yatra kvacana sambhavāt

original: 03097 dharmaḥ pakṣasapakṣānyataratva-ādir apoditaḥ
03098 tatra api vyāpako dharmo nivṛtter gamako mataḥ
analyzed: tatra api vyāpakaḥ dharmaḥ nivṛtteḥ gamakaḥ mataḥ

original: 03098 vyāpyasya sva-nivṛttiś cet paricchinnā kathaṃcana
analyzed: vyāpyasya sva nivṛttiḥ ced paricchinnā kathaṃcana

original: 03099 yad apramāṇatā abhāve liṅgaṃ tasya eva kathyate

original: 03099 tad atyanta-vimūḍha-artham āgopālam asaṃvṛtteḥ
analyzed: tat atyanta vimūḍha artham āgopālam asaṃvṛtteḥ

original: 03100 etāvan niścaya-phalam abhāve anupalambhanam
03100 tac ca hetau svabhāve vā adṛśye dṛśyatayā mate
analyzed: tat ca hetau svabhāve vā adṛśye dṛśya tayā mate

original: 03101 anumānād anitya-āder grahaṇe ayaṃ kramo mataḥ

original: 03101 prāmāṇyam eva na anyatra gṛhīta-grahaṇān matam
analyzed: prāmāṇyam eva na anyatra gṛhīta grahaṇāt matam

original: 03102 na anyās yā anityatā bhāvāt pūrva-siddhaḥ sa ca indriyāt
analyzed: na anyās yā anitya tā bhāvāt pūrvasiddhaḥ sa ca indriyāt

original: 03102 na aneka-rūpo vācyo asau vācyo dharmo vikalpajaḥ
analyzed: na aneka rūpaḥ vācyaḥ asau vācyaḥ dharmaḥ vikalpa jaḥ

original: 03103 sāmānya-āśraya-saṃsiddhau sāmānyaṃ siddham eva tat

original: 03103 tad-asiddhau tathā asya eva hy anumānaṃ pravartate

original: 03104 kvacit tad aparijñānaṃ sadṛśa-apara-sambhavāt
analyzed: kvacid tat a parijñānam sadṛśa apara sambhavāt

original: 03104 bhrānter apaśyato bhedaṃ māyā-golaka-bheda-vat

original: 03105 tathā hy aliṅgam ābālam asaṃśliṣṭa-uttara-udayam
analyzed: tathā hi aliṅgam ābālam asaṃśliṣṭa auttara audayam

original: 03105 paśyan paricchinatty eva dīpa-ādi-nāśinaṃ janaḥ
analyzed: paśyan paricchinatti eva dīpa ādi nāśinam janaḥ

original: 03106 bhāva-svabhāva-bhūtāyām api śaktau phale adṛśaḥ
analyzed: bhāva svabhāva bhūtāyām api śaktau phale adṛśaḥ

original: 03106 anānantaryato moho viniścetur apāṭavāt
03107 tasya eva vinivṛtty-artham anumāna-upavarṇanam
analyzed: tasya eva vinivṛtti artham anumāna aupavarṇanam

original: 03107 vyayasyanti īkṣaṇād eva sarva-ākārān mahā-dhiyaḥ
analyzed: vyayasyanti īkṣaṇāt eva sarva ākārāt mahā dhiyaḥ

original: 03108 vyāvṛtteḥ sarvatas tasmin vyāvṛtti-vinibandhanāḥ
analyzed: vyāvṛtteḥ sarvatas tasmin vyāvṛtti vinibandhanāḥ

original: 03108 buddhayo arthe pravartante abhinne bhinna-āśrayā iva
analyzed: buddhayaḥ arthe pravartante abhinne bhinna āśrayāḥ iva

original: 03109 yathā-codanam ākhyāś ca so asati bhrānti-kāraṇe

original: 03109 pratibhāḥ pratisandhatte sva-anurūpāḥ svabhāvataḥ
analyzed: pratibhāḥ pratisandhatte sva anurūpāḥ svabhāvataḥ

original: 03110 siddho atra apy athavā dhvaṃso liṅgād anupalambhanāt
analyzed: siddhaḥ atra api athavā dhvaṃsaḥ liṅgāt anupalambhanāt

original: 03110 prāg bhūtvā hy abhavad bhāvo anitya ity abhidhīyate

original: 03111 yasya ubhaya-anta-vyavadhi-sattā sambandha-vācinī
03111 anityatā śrutis tena tāvantāv iti kau smṛtau
analyzed: anitya tā śrutiḥ tena tāvantau iti kau smṛtau

original: 03112 prāk paścād apy abhāvaś cet sa eva anityatā na kim

original: 03112 ṣaṣṭhy-ādy-ayogād iti ced antayoḥ sa kathaṃ bhavet

original: 03113 sattā-sambandhayor dhrauvyād antābhyāṃ na viśeṣaṇam
03113 aviśeṣaṇam eva syād antau cet kārya-kāraṇe
analyzed: aviśeṣaṇam eva syāt antau ced kārya kāraṇe

original: 03114 asambandhān na bhāvasya prāg-abhāvaṃ sa vāñchati
analyzed: asambandhāt na bhāvasya prāgabhāvam sa vāñchati

original: 03114 tad-upādhi-samākhyāne te apy asya ca na sidhyataḥ

original: 03115 sattā sva-kāraṇa-aśleṣa-karaṇāt kāraṇaṃ kila

original: 03115 sā sattā sa ca sambandho nityau kāryam atha iha kim

original: 03116 yasya abhāvaḥ kriyeta asau na bhāvaḥ prāg-abhāvavān
analyzed: yasya abhāvaḥ kriyeta asau na bhāvaḥ prāgabhāvavān

original: 03116 sambandha-anabhyupagamān nityaṃ viśvam idaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: sambandha anabhyupagamāt nityam viśvam idam tatas

original: 03117 tasmād anarthās kandinyo abhinna-artha-abhimateṣv api

original: 03117 śabdeṣu vācya-bhedinyo vyatirekās padaṃ dhiyaḥ

original: 03118 viśeṣa-pratyabhijñānaṃ na pratikṣaṇa-bhedataḥ
analyzed: viśeṣa pratyabhijñānam na prati kṣaṇa bhedataḥ

original: 03118 na vā viśeṣa-viṣayaṃ dṛṣṭa-sāmyena tad-grahāt
analyzed: na vā viśeṣa viṣayam dṛṣṭa sāmyena tad grahāt

original: 03119 nidarśanaṃ tad eva iti sāmānya-agrahaṇaṃ yadi
analyzed: nidarśanam tat eva iti sāmānya agrahaṇam yadi

original: 03119 nidarśanatvāt siddhasya pramāṇena asya kiṃ punaḥ
analyzed: nidarśana tvāt siddhasya pramāṇena asya kim punar

original: 03120 vismṛtatvād adoṣaś cet tad eva anidarśanam

original: 03120 dṛṣṭe tadbhāva-siddhiś cet pramāṇād anya-vastuni
analyzed: dṛṣṭe tad bhāva siddhiḥ ced pramāṇāt anya vastuni

original: 03121 tattva-ārope viparyāsas tat siddher apramāṇatā
03121 pratyakṣa-itarayor aikyād eka-siddhir dvayor api
03122 sandhīyamānaṃ ca anyena vyavasāyaṃ smṛtiṃ viduḥ
analyzed: sandhīyamānam ca anyena vyavasāyam smṛtim viduḥ

original: 03122 tal-liṅga-apekṣaṇān no cet smṛtir na vyabhicārataḥ

original: 03123 pratyakṣaṃ kalpanā-apoḍhaṃ pratyakṣeṇa eva sidhyati
analyzed: pratyakṣam kalpanā apoḍham pratyakṣeṇa eva sidhyati

original: 03123 pratyātmavedyaḥ sarveṣāṃ vikalpo nāma-saṃśrayaḥ
analyzed: pratyātma vedyaḥ sarveṣām vikalpaḥ nāma saṃśrayaḥ

original: 03124 saṃhṛtya sarvataś cintāṃ stimitena antara-ātmanā
analyzed: saṃhṛtya sarvatas cintām stimitena antaraātmanā

original: 03124 sthito api cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate sā akṣajā matiḥ
analyzed: sthitaḥ api cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate sā akṣa jā matiḥ

original: 03125 punar vikalpayan kiṃcid āsīn me kalpanā īdṛśī
analyzed: punar vikalpayan kiṃcid āsīt me kalpanā īdṛśī

original: 03125 icchā ca iti na pūrva-ukta-avasthāyām indriyād gatau

original: 03126 ekatra dṛṣṭo bhedo hi kvacin na anyatra dṛśyate

original: 03126 na tasmāt bhinnam asty anyat sāmānyaṃ buddhy-abhedataḥ
analyzed: na tasmāt bhinnam asti anyat sāmānyam buddhi abhedataḥ

original: 03127 tasmād viśeṣa-viṣayā sarvā eva indriyajā matiḥ
analyzed: tasmāt viśeṣa viṣayā sarvā eva indriya jā matiḥ

original: 03127 na viśeṣeṣu śabdānāṃ saṃketasya apravṛttitaḥ
analyzed: na viśeṣeṣu śabdānām saṃketasya apravṛttitaḥ

original: 03128 ananvayād viśeṣāṇāṃ saṃketasya apravṛttitaḥ
analyzed: ananvayāt viśeṣāṇām saṃketasya apravṛttitaḥ

original: 03128 viṣayo yaś ca śabdānāṃ saṃyojyeta sa eva taiḥ
analyzed: viṣayaḥ yaḥ ca śabdānām saṃyojyeta saḥ eva taiḥ

original: 03129 asya idam iti sambandhe yāv arthau pratibhāsinau
analyzed: asya idam iti sambandhe yau arthau pratibhāsinau

original: 03129 tayor eva hi sambandho na tadā indriya-gocaraḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ eva hi sambandhaḥ na tadā indriya gocaraḥ

original: 03130 viśada-pratibhāsasya tadā arthasya avibhāvanāt
analyzed: viśada pratibhāsasya tadā arthasya a vibhāvanāt

original: 03130 vijñāna-ābhāsa-bhedaś ca padārthānāṃ viśeṣakaḥ
03131 cakṣuṣo artha-avabhāse api yaṃ paro asya iti śaṃsati
analyzed: cakṣuṣaḥ artha avabhāse api yam paraḥ asya iti śaṃsati

original: 03131 sa eva yojyate śabdairn na khalv indriya-gocaraḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva yojyate śabdaiḥ na khalu indriya gocaraḥ

original: 03132 avyāvṛta-indriyasya anya-vāṅ mātreṇa avibhāvanāt
analyzed: avyāvṛta aindriyasya anya vāc mātreṇa avibhāvanāt

original: 03132 na ca anudita-sambandhaḥ svayaṃ jñāna-prasaṅgataḥ
analyzed: na ca anudita sambandhaḥ svayam jñāna prasaṅgataḥ

original: 03133 manasor yugapad vṛtteḥ savikalpa-avikalpayoḥ
analyzed: manasoḥ yugapad vṛtteḥ sa vikalpa avikalpayoḥ

original: 03133 vimūḍho laghuvṛtter vā tayor aikyaṃ vyayasyati
analyzed: vimūḍhaḥ laghu vṛtteḥ vā tayoḥ aikyam vyayasyati

original: 03134 vikalpa-vyavadhānena vicchinnaṃ darśanaṃ bhavet
analyzed: bhavet

original: 03134 iti ced bhinna-jātīya-vikalpe anyasya vā katham
analyzed: iti ced bhinna jātīya vikalpe anyasya vā katham

original: 03135 alāta-dṛṣṭi-vad bhāva-pakṣaś ced balavān mataḥ
analyzed: alāta dṛṣṭi vat bhāva pakṣaḥ ced balavān mataḥ

original: 03135 anyatra api samānaṃ tad varṇayor vā sakṛc śrutiḥ
analyzed: anyatra api samānam tat varṇayoḥ vā sakṛt śrutiḥ

original: 03136 sakṛt saṃgata-sarva-artheṣv indriyeṣv iha satsv api
analyzed: sakṛt saṃgata sarva artheṣu indriyeṣu iha satsu api

original: 03136 pañcabhir vyavadhāne api bhāty avyavahita iva yā
analyzed: pañcabhiḥ vyavadhāne api bhāti avyavahite iva yā

original: 03137 sā matir nāma paryanta-kṣaṇika-jñāna-miśraṇāt
analyzed: sā matiḥ nāma paryanta kṣaṇika jñāna miśraṇāt

original: 03137 vicchinna-ābhā iti tac citraṃ tasmāt santu sakṛd dhiyaḥ
analyzed: vicchinna ābhāḥ iti tat citram tasmāt santu sakṛt dhiyaḥ

original: 03138 pratibhāsa-aviśeṣaś ca sā antara-anantare katham
analyzed: pratibhāsa aviśeṣaḥ ca sā antara anantare katham

original: 03138 śuddhe mano-vikalpe ca na krama-grahaṇam bhavet
analyzed: śuddhe manaḥ vikalpe ca na krama grahaṇam bhavet

original: 03139 saktyā anya-utpatti-vaiguṇyāc codyaṃ vā etad dvayor api

original: 03140 śīghra-vṛtter alāta-āder anvaya-pratighātinī
analyzed: śīghra vṛtteḥ alāta ādeḥ anvaya pratighātinī

original: 03140 cakra-bhrāntiṃ dṛśā dhatte na dṛśāṃ ghaṭanena sā

original: 03141 kecid indriyajatva-āder bāla-dhī-vad akalpanām
03141 āhur bālā vikalpe ca hetuṃ saṃketa-mandatām
analyzed: āhuḥ bālāḥ vikalpe ca hetum saṃketa manda tām

original: 03142 teṣāṃ pratyakṣam eva syād bālānām avikalpanāt

original: 03142 saṃketa-upāya-vigamāt paścād api bhaven na saḥ

original: 03143 mano avyutpanna-saṃketam asti tena sa cen mataḥ
analyzed: manaḥ avyutpanna saṃketam asti tena sa ced mataḥ

original: 03143 evam indriyaje api syād śeṣavac ca idam īdṛśam
analyzed: evam indriya je api syāt śeṣavat ca idam īdṛśam

original: 03144 yad eva sādhanaṃ bāle tad eva atra api kathyatām
analyzed: yat eva sādhanam bāle tat eva atra api kathyatām

original: 03144 sāmyād akṣa-dhiyām uktam anena anubhava-ādikam
analyzed: sāmyāt akṣa dhiyām uktam anena anubhava ādikam

original: 03145 viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca sambandhaṃ laukikīṃ sthitim

original: 03145 gṛhītvā saṃkalayya etat tathā pratyeti na anyathā
analyzed: gṛhītvā saṃkalayya etat tathā pratyeti na anyathā

original: 03146 yathā daṇḍini jāty-āder vivekena anirūpaṇāt
analyzed: yathā daṇḍini jāti ādeḥ vivekena anirūpaṇāt

original: 03146 tadvatā yojanā na asti kalpanā apy atra na asty ataḥ
analyzed: tadvatā yojanā na asti kalpanā api atra na asti atas

original: 03147 yady apy anvayi vijñānaṃ śabda-vyakty-avabhāsi tat
analyzed: api

original: 03147 varṇa-ākṛty-akṣara-ākāra-śūnyaṃ gotvaṃ hi varṇyate
analyzed: varṇa ākṛti akṣara ākāra śūnyam go tvam hi varṇyate

original: 03148 samānatve api tasya eva na īkṣaṇaṃ netra-gocaram
analyzed: samāna tve api tasya eva naḥ īkṣaṇam netra gocaram

original: 03148 pratibhāsa-dvaya-abhāvād buddher bhedaś ca durlabhaḥ
analyzed: pratibhāsa dvaya abhāvāt buddheḥ bhedaḥ ca durlabhaḥ

original: 03149 samavāya-agrahād akṣaiḥ sambandha-adarśanaṃ sthitam

original: 03149 paṭas tantuṣv iha ity ādi-śabdāś ca ime svayaṃ kṛtāḥ

original: 03150 śṛṅgaṅ gavi iti loke syāc śṛṅge gaur ity alaukikam

original: 03150 gava-ākhya-pariśiṣṭa-aṅga-viccheda-anupalambhanāt

original: 03151 tais tantubhir iyaṃ śāṭi ity uttaraṃ kāryam ucyate

original: 03151 tantu-saṃskāra-sambhūtaṃ na eka-kālaṃ kathaṃcana

original: 03152 kāraṇa-āropataḥ kaścid eka-apodhārato api vā

original: 03152 tantv-ākhyāṃ vartayet kārye darśayan na āśrayaṃ śruteḥ

original: 03153 upakāryopakāritvaṃ vicchedād dṛṣṭir eva vā

original: 03153 mukhyaṃ yad askhalaj jñānam ādi-saṃketa-gocaraḥ

original: 03154 anumānaṃ ca jāty-ādau vastuno na asti bhedini

original: 03155 vastu-prāsāda-mālā-ādi-śabdāś ca anya-anapekṣiṇaḥ

original: 03155 geho yady api saṃyogas tan mālā kiṃ nu tad bhavet

original: 03156 jātiś ced geha eko api mālā ity ucyeta vṛkṣa-vat

original: 03156 mālā-bahutve tac śabdaḥ kathaṃ jāter ajātitaḥ
analyzed: mālā bahutve tat śabdaḥ katham jāteḥ ajātitaḥ

original: 03157 mālā-ādau ca mahattva-ādir iṣṭo yaś ca aupacārikaḥ

original: 03157 mukhya-aviśiṣṭa-vijñāna-grāhyatvān na aupacārikaḥ

original: 03158 ananyahetutā tulyā sā mukhya-abhimateṣv api
analyzed: ananya hetutā tulyā sā mukhya abhimateṣu api

original: 03158 padārtha-śabdaḥ kaṃ hetum anyaṃ ṣaṭkaṃ samīkṣate

original: 03159 yo yathā rūḍhitaḥ siddhas tat-sāmya-ādyas tathā ucyate

original: 03160 saṃketa-anvayinī rūḍhir vaktur icchā anvayī ca saḥ
03160 kriyate vyavahāra-arthaṃ chandaḥ śabda-aṃśa-nāma-vat
analyzed: kriyate vyavahāra artham chandaḥ śabda aṃśa nāmavat

original: 03161 vastu-dharmatayā eva arthās tādṛg vijñāna-kāraṇam
analyzed: vastu dharma tayā eva arthāḥ tādṛś vijñāna kāraṇam

original: 03161 bhede api yatra taj-jñānāt tat tathā pratipadyate
analyzed: bhede api yatra tad jñānāt tat tathā pratipadyate

original: 03162 jñānāny api tathā bhede abheda-pratyavamarśane

original: 03162 ity etat kārya-viśleṣasya anvayo na eka-vastunaḥ
analyzed: iti etat kārya viśleṣasya anvayaḥ na eka vastunaḥ

original: 03163 vastūnāṃ vidyate tasmāt tan niṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ
analyzed: vastūnām vidyate tasmāt tat niṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ

original: 03163 bāhya-śakti-vyavaccheda-niṣṭhā abhāve api tac-śrutiḥ

03164 tato anyāpoha-niṣṭhatvād uktā anyāpoha-kṛc śrutiḥ
analyzed: tatas anya apoha niṣṭha tvāt uktā anya apoha kṛt śrutiḥ

original: 03165 vyatirekī iva yaj jñāne bhāty artha-pratibimbakam
analyzed: iva

original: 03165 śabdāt tad api na artha-ātmā bhrāntiḥ sā vāsanā-udbhavā

original: 03166 tasya abhidhāne śrutibhir arthe ko aṃśo avagamyate

original: 03166 tasya agatau ca saṃketa-kriyā vyarthā tad arthikā
analyzed: tasya agatau ca saṃketa kriyā vyarthā tad arthikā

analyzed: śabdasya anvayinaḥ kāryam arthena anvayinā sa ca

original: 03169 śabda-artho arthaḥ sa eva iti vacanena virudhyate

original: 03170 anuyānti imam artha-aṃśam iti vā apoha-kṛc śrutiḥ

original: 03171 tasmāt saṃketa-kāle api nirdiṣṭa-arthena saṃyutaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt saṃketa kāle api nirdiṣṭa arthena saṃyutaḥ

original: 03171 sva-pratīti-phalena anyāpohaḥ sambandhyate śrutau
analyzed: sva pratīti phalena anya apohaḥ sambandhyate śrutau

original: 03174 pūrva-apara-parāmarśa-śūnye tac cākṣuṣe katham

original: 03175 anyatra gata-citto api cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate

analyzed: tena icchātaḥ pravarteran na īkṣeran bāhyam akṣajāḥ

original: 03177 rūpaṃ rūpam iti īkṣeta tad dhiyaṃ kim iti īkṣate

original: 03178 tasya eva anubhave dṛṣṭaṃ na vikalpa-dvayaṃ sakṛt

original: 03179 syāc ca anya-dhī-paricchedā abhinna-rūpā sva-buddhi-dhīḥ

original: 03180 atītam apadṛṣṭāntam aliṅgaṃ ca artha-darśanam

original: 03180 siddhaṃ tat kena tasmin hi na pratyakṣaṃ na laiṅgikam

original: 03181 tat svarūpa-avabhāsinyā buddhyā anantarayā yadi

original: 03181 rūpa-ādir iva gṛhyeta na syāt tat pūrva-dhī-grahaḥ

original: 03182 so avikalpaḥ sva-viṣayo vijñāna-anubhavo yathā

original: 03182 aśakya-samayaṃ tadvad anyad apy avikalpakaḥ
03183 sāmānya-vācinaḥ śabdās tad eka-arthā ca kalpanā
analyzed: sāmānya vācinaḥ śabdāḥ tat eka arthā ca kalpanā

original: 03183 abhāve nirvikalpasya viśeṣa-adhigamaḥ katham
analyzed: abhāve nirvikalpasya viśeṣa adhigamaḥ katham

original: 03184 asti cen nirvikalpaṃ ca kiṃcit tat-tulya-hetukam
analyzed: asti ced nirvikalpam ca kiṃcid tad tulya hetukam

original: 03184 sarvan tathā eva hetor hi bhedād bhedaḥ phala-ātmanām
analyzed: tathā eva hetoḥ hi bhedāt bhedaḥ phala ātmanām

original: 03185 anapekṣita-bāhya-artha-yojanā samaya-smṛteḥ
03185 tathā anapekṣya samayaṃ vastu-śaktyā eva netra-dhīḥ
analyzed: tathā an apekṣya samayam vastu śaktyā eva netra dhīḥ

original: 03186 saṃketa-smaraṇa-apekṣaṃ rūpaṃ yady akṣa-cetasi

original: 03186 anapekṣya na cec śakyaṃ syāt smṛtāv eva liṅga-vat

original: 03187 tasyās tat-saṃgama-utpatter akṣa-dhīḥ syāt smṛter na vā

original: 03187 tataḥ kāla-antare api syāt kvacid vyākṣepa-sambhavāt
analyzed: tatas kāla antare api syāt kvacid vyākṣepa sambhavāt

original: 03188 krameṇa ubhaya-hetuś cet prāg eva syād abhedataḥ

original: 03188 anyo akṣa-buddhi-hetuś cet smṛtis tatra apy anarthikā

original: 03189 yathā samita-siddhy-artham iṣyate samaya-smṛtiḥ
analyzed: yathā samita siddhi artham iṣyate samaya smṛtiḥ

original: 03189 bhedaś ca asamito grāhyaḥ smṛtis tatra kim arthikā

original: 03190 sāmānya-mātra-grahaṇe bheda-apekṣā na yujyate
analyzed: sāmānya mātra grahaṇe bheda apekṣā na yujyate

original: 03190 tasmāc cakṣuś ca rūpāṃ ca pratītya udeti netra-dhīḥ
analyzed: tasmāt cakṣuḥ ca rūpām ca pratītya udeti netra dhīḥ

original: 03191 sākṣāc cet jñāna-janane samartho viṣayo akṣa-vat
analyzed: sākṣāt ced jñāna janane samarthaḥ viṣayaḥ akṣa vat

original: 03191 atha kasmād dvaya-adhīna-janma tat tena na ucyate
analyzed: atha kasmāt dvaya adhīna janma tat tena na ucyate

original: 03192 samīkṣya gamakatvaṃ hi vyapadeśo na gṛhyate
analyzed: samīkṣya gamaka tvam hi vyapadeśaḥ na gṛhyate

original: 03192 tac ca akṣa-vyapadeśe asti tad-dharmaś ca niyojyatām

original: 03193 tato liṅga-svabhāvo atra vyapadeśe niyojyatām

original: 03193 nivartate avyāpakasya svabhāvasya nivṛttitaḥ
analyzed: nivartate avyāpakasya svabhāvasya nivṛttitaḥ

original: 03194 saṃcitaḥ samudāyaḥ sāmānyaṃ tatra ca akṣa-dhīḥ
analyzed: saṃcitaḥ samudāyaḥ sāmānyam tatra ca akṣa dhīḥ

original: 03194 sāmānya-buddhiś ca avaśyaṃ vikalpena anubudhyate
analyzed: sāmānya buddhiḥ ca avaśyam vikalpena anubudhyate

original: 03195 artha-antara-abhisambandhāj jāyante ye aṇavo apare

original: 03195 uktās te saṃcitās te hi nimittāṃ jñāna-janmanaḥ

original: 03196 aṇūnāṃ sa viśeṣaś ca na antareṇa aparān aṇūn
analyzed: aṇūnām sa viśeṣaḥ ca na antareṇa aparān aṇūn

original: 03196 tad eka-aniyamāj jñānam uktaṃ sāmānya-gocaram
03197 atha eka-āyatanatve api na anekaṃ dṛśyate sakṛt
analyzed: atha eka āyatana tve api na anekam dṛśyate sakṛt

original: 03197 sakṛd graha-avabhāsaḥ kiṃ viyukteṣu tila-ādiṣu
analyzed: sakṛt graha avabhāsaḥ kim viyukteṣu tila ādiṣu

original: 03198 pratyuktaṃ lāghavaṃ ca atra teṣv eva krama-pātiṣu
analyzed: pratyuktam lāghavam ca atra teṣu eva krama pātiṣu

original: 03198 kim na akrama-grahas tulya-kālāḥ sarvāś ca buddhayaḥ
analyzed: kim na a krama grahaḥ tulya kālāḥ sarvāḥ ca buddhayaḥ

original: 03199 kāścit tāsv akrama-ābhāsāḥ kramavatyo aparāś ca kim
analyzed: kāścid tāsu a krama ābhāsāḥ kramavatyaḥ aparāḥ ca kim

original: 03199 sarva-artha-grahaṇe tasmād akramo ayaṃ prasajyate
analyzed: sarva artha grahaṇe tasmāt a kramaḥ ayam prasajyate

original: 03200 na ekaṃ citra-pataṃga-ādi rūpaṃ vā dṛśyate katham
analyzed: na ekam citra pataṃga ādi rūpam vā dṛśyate katham

original: 03200 citraṃ tad ekam iti ced idaṃ citrataraṃ tataḥ
analyzed: citram tat ekam iti ced idam citrataram tatas

original: 03201 na ekaṃ svabhāvaṃ citraṃ hi maṇi-rūpaṃ yathā eva tat
analyzed: na ekam svabhāvam citram hi maṇi rūpam yathā eva tat

original: 03201 nīla-ādi-pratibhāsaś ca tulyaś citra-paṭa-ādiṣu

original: 03202 tatra avayava-rūpaṃ cet kevalaṃ dṛśyate tathā
analyzed: tatra avayava rūpam ced kevalam dṛśyate tathā

original: 03202 nīla-ādīni nirasya anyac citraṃ citraṃ yad īkṣase

original: 03203 tulya-artha-ākāra-kālatve na upalakṣitayor dhiyoḥ

original: 03203 nānā-arthā kramavatyā ekā kim eka-arthā akramā aparā
analyzed: nānā arthā kramavatyā ekā kim eka arthā akramā aparā

original: 03204 vaiśvarūpyād dhiyām eva bhāvānāṃ viśvarūpatā
analyzed: vaiśvarūpyāt dhiyām eva bhāvānām viśva rūpa tā

original: 03204 tac ced anaṅgaṃ kena iyaṃ siddhā bheda-vyavasthitiḥ

original: 03205 vijātīnām anārambhān na ālekhya-ādau vicitra-dhīḥ

original: 03205 arūpatvān na saṃyogaś citro bhakteś ca na āśrayaḥ

original: 03206 pratyekam avicitratvād gṛhīteṣu krameṇa ca
analyzed: pratyekam a vicitra tvāt gṛhīteṣu krameṇa ca

original: 03206 na citra-dhī-saṃkalanam anekasya ekayā agrahāt
analyzed: na citra dhī saṃkalanam anekasya ekayā agrahāt

original: 03207 nānā-arthā ekā bhavet tasmāt siddhānto apy avikalpikā
analyzed: nānā arthā ekā bhavet tasmāt siddhāntaḥ api avikalpikā

original: 03207 vikalpayann apy eka-arthaṃ yato anyad api paśyati
analyzed: vikalpayan api eka artham yatas anyat api paśyati

original: 03208 citra-avabhāseṣv artheṣu yady ekatvaṃ na yujyate

original: 03208 sā eva tāvat kathaṃ buddhir ekā citra-avabhāsinī

original: 03209 yathā yathārthāś cintyante viśīryante tathā tathā
analyzed: yathā yathā arthāḥ cintyante viśīryante tathā tathā

original: 03210 kiṃ syāt sā citratā ekasyāṃ na syāt tasyāṃ matāv api

original: 03210 yadi idaṃ svayam arthānāṃ rocate tatra ke vayaṃ

original: 03211 ekatra pratiṣiddhatvād bahuṣv api na sambhavaḥ
analyzed: ekatra pratiṣiddha tvāt bahuṣu api na sambhavaḥ

original: 03212 paricchedo antar anyo ayaṃ bhāgo bahir iva sthitaḥ

original: 03212 jñānasya abhedino bheda-pratibhāso hy upaplavaḥ

original: 03213 tatra ekasya apy abhāvena dvayam apy avahīyate

original: 03214 tad-upaplava-bhāve ca teṣāṃ bhedo apy upaplavaḥ

original: 03215 na grāhya-grāhaka-ākāra-bāhyam asti ca lakṣaṇam

original: 03217 vijñaptir vitatha-ākārā jāyate timira-ādi-vat

original: 03219 tad-upekṣita-tattva-arthaiḥ kṛtvā gaja-nimīlanam

original: 03219 kevalaṃ loka-buddhyā eva bāhya-cintā pratanyate

03220 aśakya-darśanas taṃ hi pataty arthe vivecayan

original: 03222 paṭa-ādi-rūpasya ekatve tathā syād avivekitā

03236 darśanāt pratyabhijñānaṃ gava-ādīnāṃ nivāritam

original: 03240 vācyam akṣaṇikatve syāl lakṣaṇaṃ sa-viśeṣaṇam
03241 niṣpādita-kriye kaṃcid viśeṣam asamādadhat
analyzed: niṣpādita kriye kaṃcid viśeṣam a samādadhat

original: 03241 karmaṇy aindriyam anyad vā sādhanaṃ kim iti iṣyate

03243 tasmād indriya-vijñāna-anantara-pratyaya-udbhavaḥ

original: 03245 sahakāri bhaved artha iti ced akṣa-cetasaḥ

original: 03247 hetutvam eva yuktijñā jñāna-ākāra-arpaṇa-kṣamam
03248 kāryaṃ hy aneka-hetutve apy anukurvad udeti yat
analyzed: kāryam hi aneka hetu tve api anukurvat udeti yat

original: 03249 aśakya-samayo hy ātmā rāga-ādīnām ananyabhāk

original: 03249 teṣām ataḥ svasaṃvittir na abhijalpa-anuṣaṅgiṇī

original: 03250 avedakāḥ parasya api te svarūpaṃ kathaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: avedakāḥ parasya api te svarūpam katham viduḥ

original: 03250 eka-artha-āśrayiṇā vedyā vijñānena iti kecana

original: 03251 tad-atad-rūpiṇo bhāvās tad-atad-rūpa-hetujāḥ

original: 03251 tat-sukha-ādi kim ajñānaṃ vijñāna-abhinna-hetujam

original: 03253 asatsu satsu ca eteṣu na janma-ajanma vā kvacit

original: 03254 sukha-duḥkha-ādi-bhedaś ca teṣām eva viśeṣataḥ

original: 03255 yasya arthasya nipātena te jātā dhī-sukha-ādayaḥ

original: 03255 taṃ muktvā pratipadyeta sukha-ādīn eva sā katham

original: 03256 avicchinnā na bhāseta tat-saṃvittiḥ krama-grahe

original: 03256 tal-lāghavāc cet tat-tulyam ity asaṃvedanaṃ na kim
03257 na ca ekayā dvaya-jñānaṃ niyamād akṣa-cetasaḥ
analyzed: na ca ekayā dvaya jñānam niyamāt akṣa cetasaḥ

original: 03257 sukha-ādy-abhāve apy arthāc ca jāteḥ tac śakty-asiddhitaḥ

original: 03258 pṛthak pṛthak ca sāmarthye dvayor nīla-ādi-vat sukham

original: 03258 gṛhyeta kevalaṃ tasya tad-hetv-artham agṛhṇataḥ
analyzed: gṛhyeta kevalam tasya tad hetu artham agṛhṇataḥ

original: 03259 na hi saṃvedanaṃ yuktam arthena eva saha-grahe
analyzed: na hi saṃvedanam yuktam arthena eva sahagrahe

original: 03259 kiṃ sāmarthyaṃ sukha-ādīnāṃ na iṣṭā dhīr yat tad udbhavā

analyzed: vinā arthena sukha ādīnām vedane cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ

original: 03260 rūpa-ādiḥ stry-ādi-bhedo akṣaṇā na gṛhyeta kadācana

original: 03261 na hi saty antaraṅge arthe śakter dhīr bāhya-darśanī
analyzed: na hi sati antaraṅge arthe śakteḥ dhīḥ bāhya darśanī

original: 03262 dhiyor yugapad utpattau tat-tad-viṣaya-sambhavāt
analyzed: dhiyoḥ yugapad utpattau tad tad viṣaya sambhavāt

original: 03262 sukha-duḥkha-vidau syātāṃ sakṛd arthasya sambhave

original: 03263 saty āntare apy upādāne jñāne duḥkha-ādi-sambhavaḥ
analyzed: sati āntare api upādāne jñāne duḥkha ādi sambhavaḥ

original: 03263 na upādānaṃ viruddhasya tac ca ekam iti cen matam

original: 03265 rūpa-darśana-vaiguṇya-avaiguṇye kurute sakṛt

original: 03267 artha-ātmā svātmabhūto hi teṣāṃ tair anubhūyate

original: 03269 sukha-ādy-abhinna-rūpatvān nīla-ādeś cet sakṛd grahaḥ

original: 03269 bhinna-avabhāsinor grāhyaṃ cetasos tad abhedi kim

original: 03270 tāratamyaṃ ca buddhau syān na prīti-paritāpayoḥ

03271 sa idānīṃ kathaṃ bāhyaḥ sukha-ādy-ātmā iti gamyate

original: 03272 agrāhya-grāhakatvāc ced bhinna-jātīyayoḥ

original: 03272 agrāhakaḥ syāt sarvasya tato hīyeta bhoktṛtā

original: 03273 kāryakāraṇatā anena pratyukta-akāryakāraṇe

original: 03273 grāhyagrāhakatā-abhāvād bhāve anyatra api sā bhavet

original: 03274 tasmāt ta āntarā eva saṃvedyatvāc ca cetanāḥ

original: 03282 abhūtān api paśyanti purato avasthitān iva

original: 03285 bhāvanā-pariniṣpattau tat sphuṭa-akalpa-dhī-phalam

original: 03286 tad-bhāvanājaṃ pratyakṣam iṣṭaṃ śeṣā upaplavāḥ

original: 03287 śabda-artha-grāhi yad yatra taj-jñānaṃ tatra kalpanā

03288 avikalpakam ekaṃ ca pratyakṣa-ābhaṃ caturvidham

03291 yathā eva iyaṃ parokṣa-artha-kalpanā smaraṇa-ādikā

03295 pāraṃparyeṇa hetuś ced indriya-jñāna-gocare

analyzed: ālocanā akṣa sambandha viśeṣaṇa dhiyām atas

03312 sarva-sāmānya-hetutvād akṣāṇām asti na īdṛśam

03316 sarva-ātmanā api sambaddhaṃ kaiścid eva avagamyate

original: 03316 dharmaiḥ sa niyamo na syāt sambandhasya aviśeṣataḥ

original: 03317 tad abhede api bhedo ayaṃ yasmāt tasya pramāṇatā

original: 03318 kriyā-karaṇayor aikya-virodha iti ced asat

original: 03319 bhāve hy abhinna-abhimateṣv adhyāropeṇa vṛttitaḥ

original: 03322 tat saṃvedana-bhāvasya na samarthā prasādhane

original: 03326 ātmā sa tasya anubhavaḥ sa ca na anyasya kasyacit
analyzed: ātmā sa tasya anubhavaḥ sa ca na anyasya kasyacid

original: 03326 pratyakṣa-prativedyatvam api tasya tadātmatā
analyzed: pratyakṣa prativedya tvam api tasya tad ātma tā

analyzed: na anyaḥ anubhāvyaḥ tena asti tasya na paraḥ

analyzed: tasya api tulya codya tvāt svayam sā eva prakāśate

original: 03328 nīla-ādi-rūpas tasya asau svabhāvo anubhavaś ca saḥ
analyzed: nīla ādi rūpaḥ tasya asau svabhāvaḥ anubhavaḥ ca saḥ

original: 03328 nīla-ādy-anubhavaḥ khyātaḥ svarūpa-anubhavo api san
analyzed: nīla ādi anubhavaḥ khyātaḥ svarūpa anubhavaḥ api san

original: 03329 prakāśamānas tādātmyāt svarūpasya prakāśakaḥ
03329 yathā prakāśo abhimatas tathā dhīr ātma-vedinī
analyzed: yathā prakāśaḥ abhimataḥ tathā dhīḥ ātma vedinī

original: 03330 tasyāś ca artha-antare vedye durghaṭau vedya-vedakau
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca artha antare vedye durghaṭau vedya vedakau

original: 03330 avedya-vedaka-ākārā yathā bhrāntair nirīkṣyate
analyzed: avedya vedaka ākārā yathā bhrāntaiḥ nirīkṣyate

original: 03331 vibhakta-lakṣaṇa-grāhya-grāhaka-ākāra-viplavā
03331 tathā akṛta-vyavasthā iyaṃ keśa-ādi-jñāna-bheda-vat
analyzed: tathā akṛta vyavasthā iyam keśa ādi jñāna bheda vat

original: 03332 yadā tadā na saṃcodya-grāhya-grāhaka-lakṣaṇā

original: 03332 tadā anya-saṃvido abhāvāt svasaṃvit phalam iṣyate
analyzed: tadā anya saṃvidaḥ abhāvāt sva saṃvid phalam iṣyate

original: 03333 yadi bāhyo anubhūyeta ko doṣo na eva kaścana
analyzed: yadi bāhyaḥ anubhūyeta kaḥ doṣaḥ na eva kaścana

original: 03333 idam eva kim uktaṃ syāt sa bāhyo artho anubhūyeta
analyzed: idam eva kim uktam syāt sa bāhyaḥ arthaḥ anubhūyeta

original: 03334 yadi buddhis tad-ākārā sā asty ākāra-niveśinī
analyzed: yadi buddhiḥ tad ākārā sā asti ākāra niveśinī

original: 03334 sā bāhyād anyato vā iti vicāram idam arhati

original: 03335 darśana-upādhi-rahitasya agrahāt tad-grahe grahāt
analyzed: darśana aupādhi rahitasya agrahāt tad grahe grahāt

original: 03335 darśanaṃ nīla-nirbhāsaṃ na artho bāhyo asti kevalaḥ
analyzed: darśanam nīla nirbhāsam na arthaḥ bāhyaḥ asti kevalaḥ

original: 03336 kasyacit kiṃcid eva antarvāsanāyāḥ prabodhakam
analyzed: kasyacid kiṃcid eva antarvāsanāyāḥ prabodhakam

original: 03336 tato dhiyāṃ viniyamo na bāhya-artha-vyapekṣayā
analyzed: tatas dhiyām viniyamaḥ na bāhya artha vyapekṣayā

original: 03337 tasmād dvi-rūpam asty ekaṃ yad evam anubhūyate
analyzed: tasmāt dvi rūpam asti ekam yat evam anubhūyate

original: 03337 smaryate ca ubhaya-ākārasya asya saṃvedanaṃ phalam
analyzed: smaryate ca ubhaya ākārasya asya saṃvedanam phalam

original: 03338 yadā niṣpanna-tadbhāva iṣṭo aniṣṭo api vā paraḥ
analyzed: yadā niṣpanna tad bhāvaḥ iṣṭaḥ aniṣṭaḥ api vā paraḥ

original: 03338 vijñapti-hetur viṣayas tasyāś ca anubhavas tathā
analyzed: vijñapti hetuḥ viṣayaḥ tasyāḥ ca anubhavaḥ tathā

original: 03339 yadā saviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ jñāna-aṃśe artha-vyavasthiteḥ

original: 03339 tadā ya ātma-anubhavaḥ sa eva artha-viniścayaḥ

original: 03340 yadi iṣṭa-ākāra ātmā syād anyathā vā anubhūyate
analyzed: yadi iṣṭa ākāraḥ ātmā syāt anyathā vā anubhūyate

original: 03340 iṣṭo aniṣṭo api vā tena bhavaty arthaḥ praveditaḥ
analyzed: iṣṭaḥ aniṣṭaḥ api vā tena bhavati arthaḥ praveditaḥ

original: 03341 vidyamāne api bāhya-arthe yathānubhavam eva saḥ
analyzed: vidyamāne api bāhya arthe yathānubhavam eva saḥ

original: 03341 niścita-ātmā svarūpeṇa na aneka-ātmatva-doṣataḥ
analyzed: niścita ātmā sva rūpeṇa na aneka ātma tva doṣataḥ

original: 03342 yadi bāhyaṃ na vidyeta kasya saṃvedanaṃ bhavet
analyzed: yadi bāhyam na vidyeta kasya saṃvedanam bhavet

original: 03342 yady agatyā svarūpasya bāhyasya eva na kiṃ matam
03343 abhyupāye api bhedena na syād anubhavo dvayoḥ
analyzed: abhyupāye api bhedena na syāt anubhavaḥ dvayoḥ

original: 03343 adṛṣṭa-āvaraṇān no cen na nāma-artha-vaśā gatiḥ
analyzed: adṛṣṭa āvaraṇāt no ced na nāma artha vaśā gatiḥ

original: 03344 tam aneka-ātmakaṃ bhāvam eka-ātmatvena darśayet
analyzed: tam aneka ātmakam bhāvam eka ātma tvena darśayet

original: 03344 tad adṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ nāma bhaved arthasya vedakam

original: 03345 iṣṭa-aniṣṭa-avabhāsinyaḥ kalpanā na akṣa-dhīr yadi

original: 03345 aniṣṭa-ādāv asandhānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tatra api cetasām

original: 03346 tasmāt prameye bāhye api yuktaṃ sva-anubhavaḥ phalam
analyzed: tasmāt prameye bāhye api yuktam sva anubhavaḥ phalam

original: 03346 yataḥ svabhāvo asya yathā tathā eva artha-viniścayaḥ
analyzed: yatas svabhāvaḥ asya yathā tathā eva artha viniścayaḥ

original: 03347 tadā artha-ābhāsatā eva asya pramāṇaṃ na tu sann api
analyzed: tadā artha ābhāsa tā eva asya pramāṇam na tu san api

original: 03347 grāhaka-ātmā aparārthatvād bāhyeṣv artheṣv apekṣyate
analyzed: apekṣyate

original: 03348 yasmād yathā niviṣṭo asāv artha-ātmā pratyaye tathā
analyzed: yasmāt yathā niviṣṭaḥ asau artha ātmā pratyaye tathā

original: 03348 niścīyate niviṣṭo asāv evam ity ātma-saṃvidaḥ
analyzed: niścīyate niviṣṭaḥ asau evam iti ātma saṃvidaḥ

original: 03349 ity artha-saṃvit sā eva iṣṭā yato artha-ātmā na dṛśyate
analyzed: iti artha saṃvid sā eva iṣṭā yatas artha ātmā na dṛśyate

original: 03349 tasyā buddhi-niveśya-arthaḥ sādhanaṃ tasya sā kriyā
analyzed: tasyāḥ buddhi niveśya arthaḥ sādhanam tasya sā kriyā

original: 03350 yathā niviśate so arthaḥ tathā hi sa prakāśate

original: 03350 artha-sthites tadātmatvāt svavid apy arthavin matā
analyzed: artha sthiteḥ tad ātma tvāt sva vid api artha vid matā

original: 03351 tasmād viṣaya-bhedo api na svasaṃvedanaṃ phalam

original: 03351 uktaṃ svabhāva-cintāyāṃ tādātmyād artha-saṃvidaḥ
03352 tathā avabhāsamānasya tādṛśo anya-adṛśo api vā
analyzed: tathā avabhāsamānasya tādṛśaḥ anya adṛśaḥ api vā

original: 03352 jñānasya hetur artho api ity arthasya iṣṭā prameyatā
analyzed: jñānasya hetuḥ arthaḥ api iti arthasya iṣṭā prameya tā

original: 03353 yathā kathaṃcin na asya artha-rūpaṃ yuktyā avabhāsinaḥ

original: 03354 avibhāgo api buddhy-ātma-viparyāsita-darśanaiḥ

original: 03354 grāhya-grāhaka-saṃvitti-bhedavān iva lakṣyate

original: 03355 mantra-ādy-upapluta-akṣāṇāṃ yathā mṛcchakala-ādayaḥ
analyzed: mantra ādi upapluta akṣāṇām yathā mṛd śakala ādayaḥ

original: 03355 anyathā eva avabhāsante tad-rūpa-rahitā api
analyzed: anyathā eva avabhāsante tad rūpa rahitāḥ api

original: 03356 tathā eva adarśanāt teṣām anupapluta-cakṣuṣām

original: 03356 dūre yathā vā maruṣu mahān alpo api dṛśyate

original: 03357 yathā anudarśanaṃ ca iyaṃ meya-māna-phala-sthitiḥ
analyzed: yathā anudarśanam ca iyam meya māna phala sthitiḥ

original: 03357 kriyate avidyamānā api grāhya-grāhaka-saṃvidām

original: 03358 anyathā ekasya bhāvasya nānā-rūpa-avabhāsinaḥ
analyzed: anyathā ekasya bhāvasya nānā rūpa avabhāsinaḥ

original: 03358 satyaṃ kathaṃ syur ākārās tad ekatvasya hānitaḥ
analyzed: satyam katham syuḥ ākārāḥ tat eka tvasya hānitaḥ

original: 03359 anyasya anyatva-hāneś ca na abhedo arūpa-darśanāt

original: 03359 rūpa-abhedaṃ hi paśyantī dhīr abhedaṃ vyavasyati
analyzed: rūpa abhedam hi paśyantī dhīḥ abhedam vyavasyati

original: 03360 bhāvā yena nirūpyante tad-rūpaṃ na asti tattvataḥ

original: 03360 yasmād ekam anekaṃ vā rūpaṃ teṣāṃ na vidyate
analyzed: yasmāt ekam anekam vā rūpam teṣām na vidyate

original: 03361 sādharmya-darśanāl loke bhrāntirn nāma upajāyate

original: 03361 atadātmani tādātmya-vyavasāyena na iha tat

original: 03362 adarśanāj jagat yasminn ekasya api tadātmanaḥ
analyzed: adarśanāt jagat yasmin ekasya api tad ātmanaḥ

original: 03362 asti iyam api yā tv antar upaplava-samudbhavā

original: 03363 doṣa-udbhavā prakṛtyā sā vitatha-pratibhāsinī
analyzed: doṣa audbhavā prakṛtyā sā vitatha pratibhāsinī

original: 03363 anapekṣita-sādharmya-dṛg-ādis taimira-ādi-vat
03364 tatra buddheḥ paricchedo grāhaka-ākāra-sammataḥ
analyzed: tatra buddheḥ paricchedaḥ grāhaka ākāra sammataḥ

original: 03364 tādātmyād ātmavit tasya sa tasyā sādhanaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: tādātmyāt ātma vid tasya sa sādhanam tatas

original: 03365 tatra ātma-viṣaye māne yathā rāga-ādi-vedanam
analyzed: tatra ātma viṣaye māne yathā rāga ādi vedanam

original: 03365 iyaṃ sarvatra saṃyojyā māna-meya-phala-sthitiḥ

original: 03366 tatra apy anubhava-ātmatvāt te yogyāḥ svātmasaṃvidi

original: 03366 iti sā yogyatā mānam ātmā meyaḥ phalaṃ svavit
analyzed: iti sā yogyatā mānam ātmā meyaḥ phalam sva vid

analyzed: grāhaka ākāra saṃkhyā tā pariccheda ātma tā ātmani

original: 03367 sā yogyatā iti ca proktaṃ pramāṇaṃ svātmavedanam
analyzed: sā yogyatā iti ca proktam pramāṇam sva ātma vedanam

original: 03368 sarvam eva hi vijñānaṃ viṣayebhyaḥ samudbhavat
analyzed: sarvam eva hi vijñānam viṣayebhyaḥ samudbhavat

original: 03368 tad-anyasya api hetutve kathaṃ syād viṣaya-ākṛtiḥ
analyzed: tad anyasya api hetu tve katham syāt viṣaya ākṛtiḥ

original: 03369 yathā eva āhāra-kāla-āder hetutve apatya-janmani

original: 03369 pitros tad ekasya ākāraṃ dhatte na anyasya kasyacit

original: 03370 tad-hetutvena tulye api tad-anya-viṣayaṃ matam

original: 03370 viṣayatvaṃ tad-aṅgena tad-abhāve na tad bhavet
analyzed: viṣaya tvam tad aṅgena tad abhāve na tat bhavet

original: 03371 anartha-ākāra-śaṅkā syād apy arthavati cetasi
analyzed: anartha ākāra śaṅkā syāt api arthavati cetasi

original: 03371 atīta-artha-grahe siddhe dvirūpatva-ātma-vedane

original: 03372 nīla-ādy-ābhāsa-bheditvān na artho jātir atadvatī

original: 03372 sā vā anityā na jātiḥ syān nityā vā janikā katham
analyzed: sā vai anityā na jātiḥ syāt nityā vā janikā katham

original: 03373 nāma-ādikaṃ niṣiddhaṃ prāṅ na ayam arthavatāṃ kramaḥ
analyzed: nāma ādikam niṣiddham prāk na ayam arthavatām kramaḥ

original: 03373 icchā-mātra-anubandhitvād artha-śaktirn na sidhyati

original: 03374 smṛtiś ca īdṛgvidhaṃ jñānaṃ tasyāś ca anubhavād bhavaḥ
analyzed: smṛtiḥ ca īdṛgvidham jñānam tasyāḥ ca anubhavāt bhavaḥ

original: 03374 sa ca artha-ākāra-rahitaḥ sā idānīṃ tadvatī katham

original: 03375 na arthād bhāvas tadā abhāvāt syāt tathā anubhave api saḥ
analyzed: na arthāt bhāvaḥ tadā abhāvāt syāt tathā anubhave api saḥ

original: 03375 ākāraḥ sa ca na arthasya spaṣṭa-ākāra-vivekataḥ
analyzed: ākāraḥ sa ca na arthasya spaṣṭa ākāra vivekataḥ

original: 03376 vyatiriktaṃ tam ākāraṃ pratīyād aparas tathā
analyzed: vyatiriktam tam ākāram pratīyāt aparaḥ tathā

original: 03376 nityam ātmani sambandhe pratīyāt kathitaṃ ca na

original: 03377 ekā ekena abhisambandhe pratisandhir na yujyate
analyzed: ekā ekena abhisambandhe pratisandhiḥ na yujyate

original: 03377 eka-artha-abhiniveśa-ātmā pravaktṛ-śrotṛ-cetasoḥ
analyzed: eka artha abhiniveśa ātmā pravaktṛ śrotṛ cetasoḥ

original: 03378 tad eka-vyavahāraś cet sādṛśyād atadābhayoḥ
analyzed: tat eka vyavahāraḥ ced sādṛśyāt a tad ābhayoḥ

original: 03378 bhinna-ātma-arthaḥ kathaṃ grāhyas tadā syād dhīr anarthikā
analyzed: bhinna ātma arthaḥ katham grāhyaḥ tadā syāt dhīḥ anarthikā

original: 03379 tac ca anubhava-vijñānam ubhaya-aṅga-avalambinā

original: 03379 eka-ākāra-viśeṣeṇa taj-jñānena anubadhyate

original: 03380 anyathā hy atad-ākāraṃ kathaṃ jñāne adhirohati
analyzed: anyathā hi a tad ākāram katham jñāne adhirohati

original: 03380 eka-ākāra-uttaraṃ jñānaṃ tathā hy uttaram uttaram
03381 tasya artha-rūpeṇa ākārāv ātma-ākāraś ca kaścana
analyzed: tasya artha rūpeṇa ākārau ātma ākāraḥ ca kaścana

original: 03381 dvitīyasya tṛtīyena jñānena hi vivicyate
analyzed: dvitīyasya tṛtīyena jñānena hi vivicyate

original: 03382 artha-kāryatayā jñāna-smṛtāv artha-smṛter yadi
analyzed: artha kārya tayā jñāna smṛtau artha smṛteḥ yadi

original: 03382 bhrāntyā saṅkalanaṃ jyotir manaskāre ca sā bhavet
analyzed: bhrāntyā saṅkalanam jyotiḥ manaskāre ca sā bhavet

original: 03383 sarveṣām api kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇaiḥ syāt tathā grahaḥ
analyzed: sarveṣām api kāryāṇām kāraṇaiḥ syāt tathā grahaḥ

original: 03383 kulāla-ādi-vivekena na smaryeta ghaṭas tataḥ
analyzed: kulāla ādi vivekena na smaryeta ghaṭaḥ tatas

original: 03384 yasmād atiśayāj jñānam artha-saṃsarga-bhājanam
03384 sārūpyāt tat kim anyat syād dṛṣṭeś ca yamala-ādiṣu
analyzed: sārūpyāt tat kim anyat syāt dṛṣṭeḥ ca yamalā ādiṣu

original: 03385 ādyā anubhaya-rūpatve hy eka-rūpe vyavasthitam
analyzed: ādyāḥ anubhaya rūpa tve hi eka rūpe vyavasthitam

original: 03385 dvitīyaṃ vyatiricyeta na parāmarśa-cetasā
analyzed: dvitīyam vyatiricyeta na parāmarśa cetasā

original: 03386 artha-saṃkalana-aśleṣā dhīr dvitīya-avalambate
analyzed: artha saṃkalana aśleṣā dhīḥ dvitīya avalambate

original: 03386 nīla-ādi-rūpeṇa dhiyaṃ bhāsamānāṃ puras tataḥ
analyzed: nīla ādi rūpeṇa dhiyam bhāsamānām puras tatas

original: 03387 anyathā hy ādyam eva ekaṃ saṃyojyeta artha-sambhavāt
analyzed: anyathā hi ādyam eva ekam saṃyojyeta artha sambhavāt

original: 03387 jñānaṃ na adṛṣṭa-sambandhaṃ pūrva-arthena uttarottaram
analyzed: jñānam na adṛṣṭa sambandham pūrva arthena uttara uttaram

original: 03388 sakṛt-saṃvedyamānasya niyamena dhiyā saha
analyzed: sakṛt saṃvedyamānasya niyamena dhiyā saha

original: 03388 viṣayasya tato anyatvaṃ kena ākāreṇa sidhyati
analyzed: viṣayasya tatas anya tvam kena ākāreṇa sidhyati

original: 03389 bhedaś ca bhrānti-vijñānair dṛśyeta indāv iva advaye
analyzed: bhedaḥ ca bhrānti vijñānaiḥ dṛśyeta indau iva advaye

original: 03389 saṃvitti-niyamo na asti bhinnayor nīla-pītayoḥ
analyzed: saṃvitti niyamaḥ na asti bhinnayoḥ nīla pītayoḥ

original: 03390 na artho asaṃvedanaḥ kaścid anarthasya api vedanam
analyzed: na arthaḥ asaṃvedanaḥ kaścid anarthasya api vedanam

original: 03390 dṛṣṭaṃ saṃvedyamānaṃ tat tayor na asti vivekitā
analyzed: dṛṣṭam saṃvedyamānam tat tayoḥ na asti viveki tā

original: 03391 tasmād arthasya durvāraṃ jñāna-kāla-avabhāsinaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt arthasya durvāram jñāna kāla avabhāsinaḥ

original: 03391 jñānād avyatirekitvaṃ hetu-bheda-anumā bhavet

original: 03392 abhāvād akṣa-buddhīnāṃ satsv apy anyeṣu hetuṣu

original: 03392 niyamaṃ yadi na brūyāt pratyayāt samanantarāt

03393 bāhya-artha-āśrayiṇī yā api kāraka-jñāpaka-sthitiḥ
analyzed: bāhya artha āśrayiṇī yā api kāraka jñāpaka sthitiḥ

original: 03394 sā api tad-rūpa-nirbhāsās tathā niyata-saṃgamāḥ

original: 03394 buddhir āśritya kalpyeta yadi kiṃ vā virudhyate

03395 na syāt kāraṇatāyāṃ vā kuta ekāntato gatiḥ
analyzed: na syāt kāraṇa tāyām vā kutas ekāntataḥ gatiḥ

original: 03396 tatra api dhūma-ābhāsā dhīḥ prabodha-paṭu-vāsanām

original: 03396 gamayed agni-nirbhāsāṃ dhiyam eva na pāvakam

original: 03398 dvairūpyaṃ saha-saṃvitti-niyamāt tac ca sidhyate
analyzed: ca

original: 03399 jñānam indriya-bhedena paṭu-manda-āvila-ādikām
03399 pratibhāsa-bhidām arthe bibhrad ekatra dṛśyate
analyzed: pratibhāsa bhidām arthe bibhrat ekatra dṛśyate

original: 03400 sarvaṃ tad-artham arthāc cet tasya na asti tad-ābhatā

original: 03401 tasya kenacid aṃśena parato api bhidā bhavet

original: 03402 tathā hy āśritya pitaraṃ tad-rūpo api sutaḥ pituḥ

original: 03402 bhedaṃ kenacid aṃśena kutaścid avalambate
analyzed: bhedam kenacid aṃśena kutaścid avalambate

original: 03404 tasya tad-bāhya-rūpatve kā prasanna-īkṣaṇe akṣamā
