original: 03404 bhūtaṃ paśyaṃś ca tad-darśī kathaṃ ca upahata-indriyaḥ

original: 03405 śodhitaṃ timireṇa asya vyaktaṃ cakṣur atīndriyam

original: 03405 paśyato anya-akṣa-dṛśye arthe tad-avyaktaṃ kathaṃ punaḥ

original: 03406 āloka-akṣa-manaskārād anyasya ekasya gamyate

original: 03410 anekatve aṇuśo bhinno dṛśya-adṛśya-bhidā kutaḥ

original: 03411 māndya-pāṭāv abhedena bhāso buddhi-bhidā yadi
03411 bhinne anyasminn abhinnasya kuto bhedena bhāsanam

original: 03412 mandaṃ tad api tejaḥ kim āvṛtter iha sā na kim

original: 03412 tanutvāt tejaso apy etad asty anyatra apy atānavam

original: 03414 tatra ekam eva dṛśyeta tasya anāvaraṇe sakṛt

original: 03416 pratibhāsa-bhidāṃ dhatte śeṣāḥ kumati-durnayāḥ

original: 03417 jñāna-śabda-pradīpānāṃ pratyakṣasya itarasya vā

original: 03417 janakatvena pūrveṣāṃ kṣaṇikānāṃ vināśataḥ

original: 03418 vyaktiḥ kuto asatāṃ jñānād anyasya anupakāriṇaḥ

original: 03418 vyaktau vyajyeta sarvo arthas tad-hetor niyamo yadi

original: 03427 dhiyā atadrūpayā jñāne niruddhe anubhavaḥ kutaḥ

original: 03428 buddheś ca grāhikā buddhir nityam antarmukhā-ātmani

original: 03432 nīla-āder anubhūta-ākhyā na anubhūteḥ para-ātmanoḥ

original: 03433 dhiyo nīla-ādi-rūpatve bāhyo arthaḥ kiṃ pramāṇakaḥ

original: 03433 dhiyo anīla-ādi-rūpatve sa tasya anubhavaḥ katham
analyzed: dhiyaḥ a nīla ādi rūpa tve sa tasya anubhavaḥ katham

03434 siddhaṃ tat svata eva asya kim arthena upanīyate

original: 03435 sarvātmanā hi sārūpye jñānam ajñānatāṃ vrajet

original: 03436 yathā nīla-ādi-rūpatvān nīla-ādy-anubhavo mataḥ

original: 03437 tasmād adoṣa iti cet na arthe apy asty eṣa sarvadā

original: 03438 kasmād vā anubhave na asti sati sattā-nibandhane

original: 03438 api ca idaṃ yad ābhāti dṛśyamāne sita-ādike

original: 03439 puṃsāṃ sita-ādy-abhivyakti-rūpaṃ saṃvedanaṃ sphuṭam
03439 tat kiṃ sita-ādy-abhivyakteḥ pararūpam atha ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tat kim sita ādi abhivyakteḥ para rūpam atha ātmanaḥ

original: 03441 dṛṣṭyā ca ajñāta-sambandhaṃ viśinaṣṭi tayā katham

original: 03442 yasmād dvayor eka-gatau na dvitīyasya darśanam

original: 03444 atha ātma-rūpan no vetti pararūpasya vit katham

original: 03447 atha svarūpaṃ sā tarhi svayam eva prakāśate

analyzed: etena anātmavid pakṣe sarvaartha adarśanena ye

original: 03448 apratyakṣāṃ dhiyaṃ prāhus te api nirvarṇita-uttarāḥ
analyzed: apratyakṣām dhiyam prāhuḥ te api nirvarṇita auttarāḥ

original: 03449 āśraya-ālambana-abhyāsa-bhedād bhinna-pravṛttayaḥ
analyzed: āśraya ālambana abhyāsa bhedāt bhinna pravṛttayaḥ

original: 03449 sukha-duḥkha-abhilāṣa-ādi-bhedā buddhaya eva tāḥ
analyzed: sukha duḥkha abhilāṣa ādi bhedāḥ buddhayaḥ eva tāḥ

original: 03450 pratyakṣās tad-viviktaṃ ca na anyat kiṃcid vibhāvyate

original: 03450 yat taj-jñānam paro apy enāṃ bhuñjīta anyena vid yadi
analyzed: yat tat jñānam paraḥ api enām bhuñjīta anyena vid yadi

original: 03451 tajjā tat pratibhāsā vā yadi dhīr vetti na aparā
analyzed: tad jā tat pratibhāsā vā yadi dhīḥ vetti na aparā

original: 03451 ālambamānasya anyasya apy asty avaśyam idaṃ dvayam
analyzed: ālambamānasya anyasya api asti avaśyam idam dvayam

original: 03452 atha na utpadyate tasmān na ca tat pratibhāsinī
analyzed: atha na utpadyate tasmāt na ca tat pratibhāsinī

original: 03452 sā dhīrn nirviṣayā prāptā sāmānyaṃ ca tad-agrahe
analyzed: sā dhīḥ nirviṣayā prāptā sāmānyam ca tad agrahe

original: 03453 na gṛhyata iti proktaṃ na ca tad-vastu kiṃcana
analyzed: na gṛhyate iti proktam na ca tat vastu kiṃcana

original: 03453 tasmād artha-avabhāso asau na anyas tasyā dhiyas tataḥ
analyzed: tasmāt artha avabhāsaḥ asau na anyaḥ tasyāḥ dhiyaḥ tatas

original: 03454 siddhe pratyakṣa-bhāva-ātmavidau gṛhṇāti tat punaḥ
analyzed: siddhe pratyakṣa bhāva ātma vidau gṛhṇāti tat punar

original: 03454 na adhyakṣam iti ced eṣa kuto bhedaḥ samarthayoḥ
analyzed: na adhyakṣam iti ced eṣa kutas bhedaḥ samarthayoḥ

original: 03455 adṛṣṭa-eka-artha-yoga-ādeḥ saṃvido niyamo yadi
analyzed: adṛṣṭa eka artha yoga ādeḥ saṃvidaḥ niyamaḥ yadi

original: 03455 sarvathā anyo na gṛhṇīyāt saṃvid bhedo apy apoditaḥ
analyzed: sarvathā anyaḥ na gṛhṇīyāt saṃvid bhedaḥ api apoditaḥ

original: 03456 yeṣāṃ ca yogino anyasya pratyakṣeṇa sukha-ādikam
analyzed: yeṣām ca yoginaḥ anyasya pratyakṣeṇa sukha ādikam

original: 03456 vidanti tulya-anubhavās tadvat te api syur āturāḥ
analyzed: vidanti tulya anubhavāḥ tadvat te api syuḥ āturāḥ

original: 03457 viṣaya-indriya-sampāta-abhāvāt teṣāṃ tad-udbhavam
analyzed: viṣaya aindriya sampāta abhāvāt teṣām tat udbhavam

original: 03457 na udeti duḥkham iti cet na vai duḥkha-samudbhavaḥ
analyzed: na udeti duḥkham iti ced na vai duḥkha samudbhavaḥ

original: 03458 duḥkha-asaṃvedanaṃ kiṃ tu duḥkha-jñāna-samudbhavaḥ
analyzed: duḥkha asaṃvedanam kim tu duḥkha jñāna samudbhavaḥ

original: 03458 na hi duḥkha-ādy-asaṃvedyaṃ pīḍā-anugraha-kāraṇam
analyzed: na hi duḥkha ādi asaṃvedyam pīḍā anugraha kāraṇam

original: 03459 bhāsamānaṃ svarūpeṇa pīḍā duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ yadā
analyzed: bhāsamānam sva rūpeṇa pīḍā duḥkham svayam yadā

original: 03459 na tad-ālambanaṃ jñānaṃ na tadā evaṃ prayujyate
analyzed: na tad ālambanam jñānam na tadā evam prayujyate

original: 03460 bhinne jñānasya sarvasya tena ālambana-vedane
analyzed: bhinne jñānasya sarvasya tena ālambana vedane

original: 03460 artha-sārūpyam ālamba ātmā vittiḥ svayaṃ sphuṭaḥ
analyzed: artha sārūpyam ālambaḥ ātmā vittiḥ svayam sphuṭaḥ

original: 03461 api ca adhyakṣatā abhāve dhiyaḥ syāl liṅgato gatiḥ
analyzed: api ca adhyakṣa tā abhāve dhiyaḥ syāt liṅgataḥ gatiḥ

original: 03461 tac ca akṣam artho dhīḥ pūrvo manaskāro api vā bhavet
analyzed: tat ca akṣam arthaḥ dhīḥ pūrvaḥ manaskāraḥ api vā bhavet

original: 03462 kārya-kāraṇa-sāmagryām asyāṃ sambandhinā aparam
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa sāmagryām asyām sambandhinā aparam

original: 03462 sāmarthya-adarśanāt tatra na indriyaṃ vyabhicārataḥ
analyzed: sāmarthya adarśanāt tatra na indriyam vyabhicārataḥ

original: 03463 tathā artho dhī-manaskārau jñānaṃ tau ca na sidhyataḥ
analyzed: tathā arthaḥ dhī manaskārau jñānam tau ca na sidhyataḥ

original: 03463 na aprasiddhasya liṅgatvaṃ vyaktir arthasya cen matā
analyzed: na aprasiddhasya liṅga tvam vyaktiḥ arthasya ced matā

original: 03464 liṅgaṃ sā eva nanu jñānaṃ vyakto artho anena varṇitaḥ
analyzed: liṅgam sā eva nanu jñānam vyaktaḥ arthaḥ anena varṇitaḥ

original: 03464 vyaktāv ananubhūtāyāṃ tad-vyaktatva-aviniścayāt
03465 atha arthasya eva kaścit sa viśeṣo vyaktir iṣyate
analyzed: atha arthasya eva kaścid sa viśeṣaḥ vyaktiḥ iṣyate

original: 03465 na anutpāda-vyayavato viśeṣo arthasya kaścana
analyzed: na anutpāda vyayavataḥ viśeṣaḥ arthasya kaścana

original: 03466 tad iṣṭau vā pratijñānaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ prasajyate
analyzed: tat iṣṭau vā pratijñānam kṣaṇa bhaṅgaḥ prasajyate

original: 03466 sa ca jñāto athavā ajñāto bhavej jñātasya liṅgatā
analyzed: sa ca jñātaḥ athavā ajñātaḥ bhavet jñātasya liṅga tā

original: 03467 yadi jñāte aparicchinne jñāto asāv iti tat kutaḥ
analyzed: yadi jñāte aparicchinne jñātaḥ asau iti tat kutas

original: 03467 jñātatvena aparicchinnam api tad gamakaṃ katham
03468 adṛṣṭa-dṛṣṭayo anyena draṣṭā dṛṣṭā na hi kvacit
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa dṛṣṭayaḥ anyena draṣṭā dṛṣṭāḥ na hi kvacid

original: 03468 viśeṣaḥ so anya-dṛṣṭāv apy asti iti syāt sva-dhī-gatiḥ
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ saḥ anya dṛṣṭau api asti iti syāt su adhī gatiḥ

original: 03469 tasmād anumitir buddheḥ sva-dharma-nirapekṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt anumitiḥ buddheḥ svadharma nirapekṣiṇaḥ

original: 03469 kevalān na artha-dharmāt kaḥ sva-dharmaḥ sva-dhiyo paraḥ
analyzed: kevalāt na artha dharmāt kaḥ svadharmaḥ paraḥ

original: 03470 yaḥ pratyakṣo dhiyo hetuḥ tulya-kāraṇa-janmanaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ pratyakṣaḥ dhiyaḥ hetuḥ tulya kāraṇa janmanaḥ

original: 03470 tasya bhedaḥ kuto buddher vyabhicāry-anyajaś ca saḥ
analyzed: tasya bhedaḥ kutas buddheḥ vyabhicārī anya jaḥ ca saḥ

original: 03471 rūpa-ādīn pañca viṣayāni indriyāṇy upalambhanam
analyzed: rūpa ādīn pañca viṣayāni indriyāṇi upalambhanam

original: 03471 muktvā na kāryam aparaṃ tasyāḥ samupalabhyate
analyzed: muktvā na kāryam aparam tasyāḥ samupalabhyate

original: 03472 tatra atyakṣaṃ dvayaṃ pañcasv artheṣv eko api na īkṣyate
analyzed: tatra atyakṣam dvayam pañcasu artheṣu ekaḥ api na īkṣyate

original: 03472 rūpa-darśanato jāto yo anyathā vyasta-sambhavaḥ
analyzed: rūpa darśanataḥ jātaḥ yaḥ anyathā vyasta sambhavaḥ

original: 03473 yad evam apratītaṃ tal liṅgam ity apy alaukikam
analyzed: yat evam apratītam tat liṅgam iti api alaukikam

original: 03473 vidyamāne api liṅge tāṃ tena sārdham apaśyataḥ
analyzed: vidyamāne api liṅge tām tena sārdham a paśyataḥ

original: 03474 kathaṃ pratīti-liṅgaṃ hi na adṛṣṭasya prakāśakam
analyzed: katham pratīti liṅgam hi na adṛṣṭasya prakāśakam

original: 03474 tata eva asya liṅgāt prāk prasiddher upavarṇane
analyzed: tatas eva asya liṅgāt prāk prasiddheḥ upavarṇane

original: 03475 dṛṣṭānta-antara-sādhyatvaṃ tasya api ity anavasthitiḥ
03475 ity arthasya dhiyaḥ siddhiḥ na arthāt tasyāḥ kathaṃcana
analyzed: iti arthasya dhiyaḥ siddhiḥ na arthāt tasyāḥ kathaṃcana

original: 03476 tad-aprasiddhāv arthasya svayam eva aprasiddhitaḥ
analyzed: tad aprasiddhau arthasya svayam eva aprasiddhitaḥ

original: 03476 pratyakṣāṃ ca dhiyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāś ca iṣṭa-abhidhā-ādikam
analyzed: pratyakṣām ca dhiyam dṛṣṭvā tasyāḥ ca iṣṭa abhidhā ādikam

original: 03477 para-citta-anumānaṃ ca na syād ātmany adarśanāt
analyzed: para citta anumānam ca na syāt ātmani adarśanāt

original: 03477 sambandhasya mano-buddhāv artha-liṅga-aprasiddhitaḥ
analyzed: sambandhasya manaḥ buddhau artha liṅga aprasiddhitaḥ

original: 03478 prakāśitā kathaṃ vā syāt buddhir buddhy-antareṇa vaḥ
analyzed: prakāśitā katham vā syāt buddhiḥ buddhi antareṇa vaḥ

original: 03478 aprakāśa-ātmanoḥ sā syād vyaṅgyavyañjakatā kutaḥ
03479 viṣayasya kathaṃ vyaktiḥ prakāśe rūpa-saṃkramāt
analyzed: viṣayasya katham vyaktiḥ prakāśe rūpa saṃkramāt

original: 03479 sa ca prakāśas tad-rūpaḥ svayam eva prakāśate
analyzed: sa ca prakāśaḥ tad rūpaḥ svayam eva prakāśate

original: 03480 tathā abhyupagame buddheḥ buddhau buddhiḥ svavedikā
analyzed: tathā abhyupagame buddheḥ buddhau buddhiḥ sva vedikā

original: 03480 siddhā anyathā tulya-dharmā viṣayo api dhiyā saha
analyzed: siddhāḥ anyathā tulya dharmāḥ viṣayaḥ api dhiyā saha

original: 03481 iti prakāśa-rūpā naḥ svayaṃ dhīḥ samprakāśate
analyzed: iti prakāśa rūpā naḥ svayam dhīḥ samprakāśate

original: 03481 anyo asyāṃ rūpa-saṃkrāntyā prakāśaḥ samprakāśate
analyzed: anyaḥ asyām rūpa saṃkrāntyā prakāśaḥ samprakāśate

original: 03482 sādṛśye api hi dhīr anyā prakāśyā na tayā matā
analyzed: sādṛśye api hi dhīḥ anyā prakāśyā na tayā matā

original: 03482 svayaṃ prakāśanād arthas tad-rūpeṇa prakāśate
analyzed: svayam prakāśanāt arthaḥ tad rūpeṇa prakāśate

original: 03483 yathā pradīpayor dīpa-ghaṭayoś ca tad-āśrayaḥ
analyzed: yathā pradīpayoḥ dīpa ghaṭayoḥ ca tad āśrayaḥ

original: 03483 vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvena vyavahāraḥ pratanyate
analyzed: vyaṅgya vyañjaka bhāvena vyavahāraḥ pratanyate

original: 03484 viṣaya-indriya-mātreṇa na dṛṣṭam iti niścayaḥ
analyzed: viṣaya aindriya mātreṇa na dṛṣṭam iti niścayaḥ

original: 03484 tasmād yato ayaṃ tasya api vācyam anyasya darśanam
analyzed: tasmāt yatas ayam tasya api vācyam anyasya darśanam

original: 03485 smṛter apy ātmavit siddhā jñānasya anyena vedane
analyzed: smṛteḥ api ātma vid siddhā jñānasya anyena vedane

original: 03485 dīrgha-ādi-grahaṇaṃ na syād bahu-mātra-anavasthiteḥ
analyzed: dīrgha ādi grahaṇam na syāt bahu mātra anavasthiteḥ

original: 03486 avasthitāv akramāyāṃ sakṛd ābhāsanān matau
analyzed: avasthitau akramāyām sakṛt ābhāsanāt matau

original: 03486 varṇaḥ syād akramo dīrghaḥ kramavān akramāṃ katham
analyzed: varṇaḥ syāt akramaḥ dīrghaḥ kramavān katham

original: 03487 upakuryād asaṃśliṣyan varṇa-bhāgaḥ parasparam
analyzed: upakuryāt a saṃśliṣyan varṇa bhāgaḥ parasparam

original: 03487 akrameṇa grahād anta-krama-vad dhīś ca no bhavet
analyzed: akrameṇa grahāt anta krama vat dhīḥ ca naḥ bhavet

original: 03488 āntyaṃ pūrva-sthitād ūrdhvaṃ vardhamāno dhvanir bhavet
analyzed: āntyam pūrva sthitāt ūrdhvam vardhamānaḥ dhvaniḥ bhavet

original: 03489 sthāne svayaṃ na naśyet sā paścād apy aviśeṣataḥ
analyzed: sthāne svayam na naśyet sā paścāt api aviśeṣatas

original: 03489 doṣo ayaṃ sakṛd utpanna-akrama-varṇa-sthitāv api
analyzed: doṣaḥ ayam sakṛt utpanna akrama varṇa sthitau api

original: 03490 sakṛd yatna-udbhavād vyarthaḥ syād yatnaś ca uttarottaraḥ
analyzed: sakṛt yatna odbhavāt vyarthaḥ syāt yatnaḥ ca uttara uttaraḥ

original: 03490 vyaktāv apy eṣa varṇānāṃ doṣaḥ samanuṣajyate
analyzed: vyaktau api eṣa varṇānām doṣaḥ samanuṣajyate

original: 03491 anekayā tad-grahaṇe yā antyā dhīḥ sā anubhūyate
analyzed: anekayā tad grahaṇe yā antyā dhīḥ sā anubhūyate

original: 03491 na dīrgha-grāhikā sā ca tan na syād dīrgha-dhī-smṛtiḥ
analyzed: na dīrgha grāhikā sā ca tat na syāt dīrgha dhī smṛtiḥ

original: 03492 pṛthak pṛthak ca buddhīnāṃ saṃvittau tad-dhvaniḥ śruteḥ
analyzed: pṛthak pṛthak ca buddhīnām saṃvittau tad dhvaniḥ śruteḥ

original: 03492 avicchinna-ābhatā na syād ghaṭanaṃ ca nirākṛtam
analyzed: avicchinna ābha tā na syāt ghaṭanam ca nirākṛtam

original: 03493 vicchinnaṃ śṛṇvato apy asya yady avicchinna-vibhramaḥ
analyzed: vicchinnam śṛṇvataḥ api asya yadi avicchinna vibhramaḥ

original: 03493 hrasva-dvayoc cāraṇe api syād avicchinna-vibhramaḥ
03494 vicchinne darśane ca akṣād avicchinna-adhiropaṇam
analyzed: vicchinne darśane ca akṣāt a vicchinna adhiropaṇam

original: 03494 na akṣāt sarva-akṣa-buddhīnāṃ vitathatva-prasaṅgataḥ
analyzed: na akṣāt sarva akṣa buddhīnām vitatha tva prasaṅgataḥ

original: 03495 sarva-antyo api hi varṇa-ātmā nimeṣa-tulita-sthitiḥ
analyzed: sarva antyaḥ api hi varṇa ātmā nimeṣa tulita sthitiḥ

original: 03495 sa ca kramād aneka-aṇu-sambandhena nitiṣṭhati
analyzed: sa ca kramāt aneka aṇu sambandhena nitiṣṭhati

original: 03496 eka-aṇv-atyaya-kālaś ca kālo alpīyān kṣaṇo mataḥ
analyzed: eka aṇu atyaya kālaḥ ca kālaḥ alpīyān kṣaṇaḥ mataḥ

original: 03496 buddhiś ca kṣaṇikā tasmāt kramād varṇān prapadyate
analyzed: buddhiḥ ca kṣaṇikā tasmāt kramāt varṇān prapadyate

original: 03497 iti varṇeṣu rūpa-ādāv avicchinna-avabhāsinī
analyzed: iti varṇeṣu rūpa ādau avicchinna avabhāsinī

original: 03497 vicchinnā apy anyayā buddhiḥ sarvā syād vitatha-arthikā
analyzed: vicchinnā api anyayā buddhiḥ sarvā syāt vitatha arthikā

original: 03498 ghaṭanaṃ yac ca bhāvānām anyatra indriya-vibhramāt
analyzed: ghaṭanam yat ca bhāvānām anyatra indriya vibhramāt

original: 03498 bheda-alakṣaṇa-vibhrāntaṃ smaraṇaṃ tad-vikalpakam
03499 tasya spaṣṭa-avabhāsitvaṃ jalpa-saṃsargiṇaḥ kutaḥ
03499 na akṣa-grāhye asti śabdānāṃ yojanā iti vivecitam
analyzed: na akṣa grāhye asti śabdānām yojanā iti vivecitam

original: 03500 vicchinnaṃ paśyato apy akṣair ghaṭayed yadi kalpanā
analyzed: vicchinnam paśyataḥ api akṣaiḥ ghaṭayet yadi kalpanā

original: 03500 arthasya tat saṃvitteś ca satataṃ bhāsamānayoḥ
analyzed: arthasya tat saṃvitteḥ ca satatam bhāsamānayoḥ

original: 03501 bādhake asati san nyāye vicchinna iti tat kutaḥ
analyzed: bādhake asati san nyāye vicchinnaḥ iti tat kutas

original: 03501 buddhīnāṃ śakti-niyamād iti cet sa kuto mataḥ
analyzed: buddhīnām śakti niyamāt iti ced sa kutas mataḥ

original: 03502 yugapad buddhy-adṛṣṭeś cet tad eva idaṃ vicāryate
analyzed: yugapad buddhi adṛṣṭeḥ ced tat eva idam vicāryate

original: 03502 tāsāṃ samāna-jātīye sāmarthya-niyamo bhavet
analyzed: tāsām samāna jātīye sāmarthya niyamaḥ bhavet

original: 03503 tathā hi samyak lakṣyante vikalpāḥ krama-bhāvinaḥ
analyzed: tathā hi samyak lakṣyante vikalpāḥ krama bhāvinaḥ

original: 03503 etena yaḥ samakṣe arthe pratyabhijñāna-kalpanām
analyzed: etena yaḥ samakṣe arthe pratyabhijñāna kalpanām

original: 03504 spaṣṭa-avabhāsāaṃ pratyakṣāṃ kalpayet so api vāritaḥ
analyzed: pratyakṣām kalpayet saḥ api vāritaḥ

original: 03504 keśa-golaka-dīpa-ādāv api spaṣṭa-avabhāsanāt
analyzed: keśa golaka dīpa ādau api spaṣṭa avabhāsanāt

original: 03505 pratīta-bhede apy adhyakṣā dhīḥ kathaṃ tādṛśī bhavet
analyzed: pratīta bhede api adhyakṣā dhīḥ katham tādṛśī bhavet

original: 03505 tasmān na pratyabhijñānād varṇa-ādy-ekatva-niścayaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt na pratyabhijñānāt varṇa ādi eka tva niścayaḥ

original: 03506 pūrva-anubhūta-smaraṇāt tad-dharma-āropaṇād vinā
analyzed: pūrva anubhūta smaraṇāt tad dharma āropaṇāt vinā

original: 03506 sa eva ayam iti jñānaṃ na asti tac ca akṣaje kutaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva ayam iti jñānam na asti tat ca akṣa je kutas

original: 03507 na ca artha-jñāna-saṃvittyor yugapat sambhavo yataḥ
analyzed: na ca artha jñāna saṃvittyoḥ yugapad sambhavaḥ yatas

original: 03507 lakṣyate pratibhāsau dvau na artha-artha-jñānayoḥ pṛthak
analyzed: lakṣyate pratibhāsau dvau na artha artha jñānayoḥ pṛthak

original: 03508 na hy artha-ābhāsi ca jñānam artho bāhyaś ca kevalaḥ
analyzed: na hi artha ābhāsi ca jñānam arthaḥ bāhyaḥ ca kevalaḥ

original: 03508 eka-ākāram atigrāhye bheda-abhāva-prasaṅgataḥ
analyzed: eka ākāram atigrāhye bheda abhāva prasaṅgataḥ

original: 03509 sūpalakṣyeṇa bhedena yau saṃvittau na lakṣitau
analyzed: su upalakṣyeṇa bhedena yau saṃvittau na lakṣitau

original: 03509 artha-artha-pratyayau paścāt smaryete tau pṛthak katham
analyzed: artha artha pratyayau paścāt smaryete tau pṛthak katham

original: 03510 krameṇa anubhava-utpāde apy artha-artha-manasor ayam
analyzed: krameṇa anubhava autpāde api artha artha manasoḥ ayam

original: 03510 pratibhāsasya nānātva-codya-doṣo duruddharaḥ
03511 artha-saṃvedanaṃ tāvat tato artha-ābhāsa-vedanam
analyzed: artha saṃvedanam tāvat tatas artha ābhāsa vedanam

original: 03511 na hi saṃvedanaṃ śuddhaṃ bhaved arthasya vedanam
analyzed: na hi saṃvedanam śuddham bhavet arthasya vedanam

original: 03512 tathā hi nīla-ādy-ākāra eka ekaṃ ca vedanam
analyzed: tathā hi nīla ādi ākāraḥ ekaḥ ekam ca vedanam

original: 03512 lakṣyate na tu nīla-ābhe vedane vedanaṃ param
analyzed: lakṣyate na tu nīla ābhe vedane vedanam param

original: 03513 jñāna-antareṇa anubhavo bhavet tatra api ca smṛtiḥ
analyzed: jñāna antareṇa anubhavaḥ bhavet tatra api ca smṛtiḥ

original: 03513 dṛṣṭā tad-vedanaṃ kena tasya apy anyena ced imām
analyzed: dṛṣṭā tad vedanam kena tasya api anyena ced imām

original: 03514 mālāṃ jñāna-vidāṃ ko ayaṃ janayaty anubandhinīm
analyzed: mālām jñāna vidām kaḥ ayam janayati anubandhinīm

original: 03514 pūrvā dhīḥ sā eva cen na syāt saṃcāro viṣaya-antare
analyzed: pūrvā dhīḥ sā eva ced na syāt saṃcāraḥ viṣaya antare

original: 03515 tāṃ grāhya-lakṣaṇa-prāptām āsannāṃ janikāṃ dhiyam
analyzed: tām grāhya lakṣaṇa prāptām āsannām janikām dhiyam

original: 03515 agṛhītvā uttaraṃ jñānaṃ gṛhṇīyād aparaṃ katham
analyzed: a gṛhītvā uttaram jñānam gṛhṇīyāt aparam katham

original: 03516 ātmani jñāna-janane svabhāve niyatāṃ ca tām
analyzed: ātmani jñāna janane svabhāve niyatām ca tām

original: 03517 bāhyaḥ saṃnihito apy arthaḥ tāṃ vibandhuṃ hi na prabhuḥ

original: 03517 dhiyaṃ na anubhavet kaścid anyathā arthasya saṃnidhau

original: 03518 na ca saṃnihita-arthā asti daśā kācid ato dhiyaḥ

03519 atīta-ādi-vikalpānāṃ yeṣāṃ na arthasya saṃnidhiḥ
analyzed: atīta ādi vikalpānām yeṣām na arthasya saṃnidhiḥ

original: 03519 saṃcāra-kāraṇa-abhāvād utsīded artha-cintanam

original: 03520 ātmani jñāna-janane śakti-saṃkṣayataḥ śanaiḥ

original: 03520 viṣaya-antara-saṃcāro yadi sā eva artha-dhīḥ kutaḥ
03521 śakti-kṣaye pūrva-dhiyaḥ na hi dhīḥ prāg dhiyā vinā
analyzed: śakti kṣaye pūrva dhiyaḥ na hi dhīḥ prāk dhiyā vinā

original: 03522 sakṛd vijātīya-jātāv apy ekena paṭīyasā

original: 03522 cittena āhita-vaiguṇyād ālayān na anya-sambhavaḥ
03523 na apekṣeta anyathā sāmyaṃ mano-vṛtter mano antaram

original: 03523 mano-jñāna-krama-utpattir apy apekṣā prasādhanī
03524 ekatvān manaso anyasmin saktasya anya-agater yadi

original: 03525 janma ca ātma-mano yoga-mātrajānāṃ sakṛd bhavet

original: 03526 ekā eva cet kriyā ekaḥ syāt kiṃ dīpo aneka-darśanaḥ

original: 03526 krameṇa api na śaktaṃ syāt paścād apy aviśeṣataḥ
analyzed: krameṇa api na śaktam syāt paścāt api aviśeṣatas

original: 03527 anena deha puruṣāv uktau saṃskārato yadi

original: 03528 na grāhyatā anyā jananāj jananaṃ grāhya-lakṣaṇam

original: 03528 agrāhyaṃ na hi tejo asti na ca saukṣmya-ādy-anaṃśake

original: 03530 sākṣān na hy anyathā buddhe rūpa-ādir upakārakaḥ

original: 03530 grāhyatā-lakṣaṇād anyas tadbhāva-niyamo asya kaḥ

original: 03531 buddher api tad asti iti sā api tattve vyavasthitā

original: 03531 grāhya-upādāna-saṃvittī cetaso grāhya-lakṣaṇam
03532 rūpa-ādeś cetasaś ca evam aviśuddha-dhiyaṃ prati
analyzed: rūpa ādeḥ cetasaḥ ca evam a viśuddha dhiyam prati

original: 03532 grāhya-lakṣaṇa-cintā iyam acintyā yogināṃ gatiḥ

original: 03533 tatra sūkṣma-ādi-bhāvena grāhyam agrāhyatāṃ vrajet

original: 03534 sati sva-dhī-grahe tasmāt sā eva anantara-hetutā

original: 03535 prakṛtyā eva iti gaditaṃ nānā-ekasmān na ced bhavet

original: 03536 ekaṃ syād api sāmagrayor ity uktaṃ tad anekakṛt
analyzed: syāt api   iti

original: 03537 arthaṃ pūrvaṃ ca vijñānaṃ gṛhṇīyād yadi dhīḥ parā

original: 03537 pūrva-apara-artha-bhāsitvāc cintā-ādāv eka-cetasi
03538 abhilāpa-dvayaṃ nityaṃ syād dṛṣṭa-kramam akramam
03538 dvir dvir ekaṃ ca bhāseta bhāsanād ātma-tad-vidoḥ
analyzed: dvis dvis ekam ca bhāseta bhāsanāt ātma tad vidoḥ

original: 03539 viṣaya-antara-saṃcāre yady antyaṃ na anubhūyate
analyzed: viṣaya antara saṃcāre yadi antyam na anubhūyate

original: 03539 para-anubhūtivat sarvān anubhūtiḥ prasajyate
analyzed: para anubhūti vat sarvān anubhūtiḥ prasajyate

original: 03540 ātma-anubhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na anubhūtaṃ parair yadi
analyzed: ātma anubhūtam pratyakṣam na anubhūtam paraiḥ yadi

original: 03540 ātma-anubhūtiḥ sā siddhā kṛto yena evam ucyate
analyzed: ātma anubhūtiḥ sā siddhā kṛtaḥ yena evam ucyate

original: 03541 vyakti-hetv-aprasiddhiḥ syān na vyakter vyaktam icchataḥ
analyzed: vyakti hetu aprasiddhiḥ syāt na vyakteḥ vyaktam icchataḥ

original: 03541 vyakty-asiddhāv api vyaktaṃ yadi vyaktam idaṃ jagat
analyzed: vyakti asiddhau api vyaktam yadi vyaktam idam jagat

original: 04001 dṛṣṭaḥ sādhanam ity eke tat-kṣepāya ātma-dṛg-vacaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ sādhanam iti eke tad kṣepāya ātma dṛś vacaḥ

original: 04002 vācaḥ prāmāṇyam asmin hi na anumānaṃ pravartate

original: 04003 bādhanāya āgamasya ukteḥ sādhanasya paraṃ prati
analyzed: bādhanāya āgamasya ukteḥ sādhanasya param prati

original: 04003 so apramāṇaṃ tadā asiddhaṃ tat-siddham akhilaṃ tataḥ

original: 04004 tad-āgamavataḥ siddhaṃ yadi kasya ka āgamaḥ

original: 04004 bādhyamānaḥ pramāṇena sa siddhaḥ katham āgamaḥ
analyzed: bādhyamānaḥ pramāṇena sa siddhaḥ katham āgamaḥ

original: 04005 tad-viruddha-abhyupagamas tena eva ca kathaṃ bhavet

original: 04007 sādhanaiḥ sādhanāny artha-śakti-jñāne asya tāny alam

original: 04008 vicchinna-anugamā ye ca sāmānyena apy agocarāḥ

original: 04008 sādhya-sādhana-cintā asti na teṣv artheṣu kācana

original: 04009 puṃsām abhiprāya-vaśāt tattva-atattva-vyavasthitau
04009 luptau hetu-tad-ābhāsau tasya vastv-asamāśrayāt
analyzed: luptau hetu tad ābhāsau tasya vastu asamāśrayāt

analyzed: na arthe tena na asti svatas sādhana saṃsthitiḥ

original: 04017 sādhyasya eva abhidhānena pāraṃparyeṇa na apy alam

original: 04017 śaktasya sūcakaṃ hetu-vaco aśaktam api svayam

original: 04019 vipakṣa-upagame apy etat tulyam ity anavasthitiḥ
04020 antaraṅgaṃ tu sāmarthyaṃ triṣu rūpeṣu saṃsthitam
analyzed: antaraṅgam tu sāmarthyam triṣu rūpeṣu saṃsthitam

original: 04020 tatra smṛti-samādhānaṃ tad-vacasya iva saṃsthitam

original: 04021 akhyāpite hi viṣaye hetu-vṛtter asambhavāt

original: 04021 viṣaya-khyāpanād eva siddhau cet tasya śaktatā

original: 04022 vyāpti-pūrve vinā apy asmāt kṛtakaḥ śabda īdṛśaḥ

original: 04022 sarve anityā iti prokte apy arthāt tan nāśa-dhīr bhavet

original: 04024 sādhana-adhikṛter eva hetvābhāsa-prasaṅgataḥ

original: 04025 aviśeṣa-uktir apy eka-jātīye saṃśaya-avahā
04025 anyathā sarva-sādhya-ukteḥ pratijñātvaṃ prasajyate
analyzed: anyathā sarva sādhya okteḥ pratijñā tvam prasajyate

original: 04026 siddha-ukteḥ sādhanatvāc cet parasya api na duṣyate

original: 04026 idānīṃ sādhya-nirdeśaḥ sādhana-avayavaḥ katham
analyzed: idānīm sādhya nirdeśaḥ sādhana avayavaḥ katham

original: 04027 sābhāsa-ukty-ādy-upakṣepa-parihāra-viḍambanā

original: 04027 asambaddhā tathā hy eṣa na nyāya iti sūcitam

original: 04028 gamya-arthatve api sādhya-ukter asammohāya lakṣaṇam

04029 asiddha-asādhana-artha-ukta-vādy-abhyupagama-grahaḥ
04029 anukto api icchayā vyāptaḥ sādhya ātma-artha-van mataḥ

original: 04030 sarva-anya-iṣṭa-nivṛttāv apy āśaṅkā-sthāna-vāraṇam
04030 vṛttau svayaṃ śruteḥ prāha kṛtā ca eṣā tad-arthikā

original: 04031 viśeṣas tad-vyapekṣātaḥ kathito dharma-dharmiṇoḥ

original: 04031 anuktāv api vāñchāyā bhavet prakaraṇād gatiḥ

original: 04032 ananvayo api dṛṣṭānte doṣas tasya yathoditaḥ
analyzed: ananvayaḥ api dṛṣṭānte doṣaḥ tasya yathā uditaḥ

original: 04032 ātmā paraś cet so asiddha iti tatra iṣṭa-ghātakṛt

original: 04033 sādhanaṃ yad vivāde na nyastaṃ tac cen na sādhyate

original: 04033 kiṃ sādhyam anyathā aniṣṭaṃ bhaved vaiphalyam eva vā

original: 04034 sadvitīya-prayogeṣu niranvaya-viruddhate
analyzed: sa dvitīya prayogeṣu

original: 04034 etena kathite sādhyaṃ sāmānyena atha sammatam
04035 tad eva artha-antara-abhāvād deha-anāptau na sidhyate
analyzed: tat eva artha antara abhāvāt deha anāptau na sidhyate

original: 04035 vācyaṃ śūnyaṃ pralapatāṃ tad etaj jāḍya-cintitam
analyzed: vācyam śūnyam pralapatām tat etat jāḍya cintitam

original: 04036 tulyaṃ nāśe api cec śabda-ghaṭa-bhedena kalpane
analyzed: tulyam nāśe api ced śabda ghaṭa bhedena kalpane

original: 04036 na siddhena vināśena tadvataḥ sādhanād dhvaneḥ

original: 04037 tathā artha-antara-bhāve syāt tadvān kumbho apy anityatā

original: 04037 viśiṣṭā dhvaninā anveti no cen na ayoga-vāraṇāt
analyzed: viśiṣṭā dhvaninā anveti no ced na ayoga vāraṇāt

original: 04038 dvividho hi vyavacchedo viyoga-apara-yogayoḥ
analyzed: dvividhaḥ hi vyavacchedaḥ viyoga apara yogayoḥ

original: 04038 vyavacchedād ayoge tu na anyena ananvaya-āgamaḥ
analyzed: vyavacchedāt ayoge tu na anyena ananvaya āgamaḥ

original: 04039 sāmānyam eva tat sādhyaṃ na ca siddha-prasādhanam
analyzed: sāmānyam eva tat sādhyam na ca siddha prasādhanam

original: 04039 viśiṣṭaṃ dharmiṇā tac ca na niranvaya-doṣavat
analyzed: viśiṣṭam dharmiṇā tat ca na niranvaya doṣavat

original: 04040 etena dharmi-dharmābhyāṃ viśiṣṭau dharma-dharmiṇau

original: 04100 pratijñām anumānaṃ vā pratijñā-apeta-yuktikā
analyzed: pratijñām anumānam vā pratijñā apeta yuktikā

original: 04100 tulya-kakṣyā yathārthaṃ vā bādheta katham anyathā
analyzed: tulya kakṣyāḥ yathārtham vā bādheta katham anyathā

original: 04101 prāmāṇyam āgamānāṃ ca prāg eva vinivāritam
analyzed: prāmāṇyam āgamānām ca prāk eva vinivāritam

original: 04101 abhyupāya-vicāreṣu tasmād doṣo ayam iṣyate
analyzed: abhyupāya vicāreṣu tasmāt doṣaḥ ayam iṣyate

original: 04102 tasmād viṣaya-bhedasya darśanāya pṛthak kṛtaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt viṣaya bhedasya darśanāya pṛthak kṛtaḥ

original: 04102 anumāna-abahirbhūto apy abhyupāyaḥ prabādhanāt
analyzed: anumāna abahirbhūtaḥ api abhyupāyaḥ prabādhanāt

original: 04103 anyathā atiprasaṅgaḥ syād vyarthatā vā pṛthak kṛteḥ

original: 04103 bhedo vāṅ-mātra-vacane pratibandhaḥ sva-vācy api
analyzed: bhedaḥ vāc mātra vacane pratibandhaḥ sva vāci api

original: 04104 tena abhyupagamāc śāstraṃ pramāṇam sarva-vastuṣu

original: 04104 bādhakaṃ yadi na icchet sa bādhakaṃ kiṃ punar bhavet

original: 04105 sva-vāg-virodho abhedaḥ syāt sva-vāk-śāstra-virodhayoḥ
analyzed: sva vāc virodhaḥ abhedaḥ syāt sva vāc śāstra virodhayoḥ

original: 04105 puruṣa-icchā kṛtā ca asya paripūrṇā pramāṇatā

original: 04106 tasmāt prasiddheṣv artheṣu śāstra-tyāge api na kṣatiḥ
analyzed: tasmāt prasiddheṣu artheṣu śāstra tyāge api na kṣatiḥ

original: 04106 parokṣeṣv āgama-aniṣṭau na cintā eva pravartate
analyzed: parokṣeṣu āgama aniṣṭau na cintā eva pravartate

original: 04107 virodha-udbhāvana-prāyā parīkṣā apy atra tad-yathā

original: 04107 adharma-mūlaṃ rāga-ādi snānaṃ ca adharma-śodhanam
analyzed: adharma mūlam rāga ādi snānam ca adharma śodhanam

original: 04108 śāstraṃ yat siddhayā yuktyā sva-vācā ca na bādhyate

original: 04108 dṛṣṭe adṛṣṭe api tad grāhyam iti cintā pravartate
analyzed: dṛṣṭe adṛṣṭe api tat grāhyam iti cintā pravartate

original: 04109 artheṣv apratiṣiddhatvāt puruṣa-icchā-anurodhinaḥ
analyzed: artheṣu a pratiṣiddha tvāt puruṣa ecchā anurodhinaḥ

original: 04109 iṣṭa-śabda-abhidheyatvasya āpto atra akṣata-vāg janaḥ

original: 04110 uktaḥ prasiddha-śabdena dharmas tad vyavahārajaḥ

original: 04110 pratyakṣa-ādim iti māna-śruty-āropeṇa sūcitaḥ

original: 04111 tad-āśraya-bhuvām icchā-vartitvād aniṣedhinām

original: 04111 kṛtānām akṛtānāṃ vā yogyaṃ viśvaṃ svabhāvataḥ

original: 04112 artha-mātra-anurodhinyā bhāvinyā bhūtayā api vā
analyzed: artha mātra anurodhinyā bhāvinyā bhūtayā api vā

original: 04113 tad-yogyatā-balād eva vastuto ghaṭito dhvaniḥ

original: 04114 asādhāraṇatā na syāt bādhā-hetor iha anyathā

original: 04114 tan niṣedho anumānāt syāc śabda-arthe anakṣa-vṛttitaḥ
analyzed: tat niṣedhaḥ anumānāt syāt śabda arthe an akṣa vṛttitaḥ

original: 04115 asādhāraṇatā tatra hetūnāṃ yatra na anvayi

original: 04115 sattvam ity abhyudāhāro hetor evaṃ phalo mataḥ

original: 04116 saṃketa-saṃśrayāḥ śabdāḥ sa ca icchā-mātra-saṃśrayaḥ
analyzed: saṃketa saṃśrayāḥ śabdāḥ sa ca icchā mātra saṃśrayaḥ

original: 04116 na asiddhiḥ śabda-siddhānām iti śabda-prasiddha-vāk
analyzed: na asiddhiḥ śabda siddhānām iti śabda prasiddha vāc

original: 04117 anumāna-prasādhyeṣu viruddhāvyabhicāriṇaḥ
analyzed: anumāna prasādhyeṣu viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ

original: 04117 abhāvaṃ darśayaty evaṃ pratīter anumā tv ataḥ
analyzed: darśayati evam

original: 04118 athavā bruvato lokasya anumā abhāva ucyate
analyzed: athavā bruvataḥ lokasya anumā abhāvaḥ ucyate

original: 04118 kiṃ tena bhinna-viṣayā pratītir anumānataḥ

original: 04119 tena anumānād vastūnāṃ sad-asattā-anurodhinaḥ
analyzed: tena anumānāt vastūnām sat asat tā anurodhinaḥ

original: 04119 bhinnasya atad-vaśād vṛttis tad icchājā iti sūcitam
04120 candratāṃ śaśino anicchan kāṃ pratītiṃ sa vāñchati
analyzed: candra tām śaśinaḥ an icchan kām pratītim sa vāñchati

original: 04120 iti taṃ praty adṛṣṭāntaṃ tad-asādhāraṇaṃ matam
analyzed: iti tam prati adṛṣṭāntam tat asādhāraṇam matam

original: 04121 na udāharaṇam eva idam adhikṛtya idam ucyate
analyzed: na udāharaṇam eva idam adhikṛtya idam ucyate

original: 04121 lakṣaṇatvāt tathā avṛkṣo dhātrī ity uktau ca bādhanāt
analyzed: lakṣaṇa tvāt tathā avṛkṣaḥ dhātrī iti uktau ca bādhanāt

original: 04122 atra api loke dṛṣṭatvāt karpūra-rajata-ādiṣu

original: 04122 samayād vartamānasya kā asādhāraṇatā abhidhā
analyzed: samayāt vartamānasya kā asādhāraṇa tā abhidhā

original: 04123 yadi tasya kvacit sidhyet siddhaṃ vastu-balena tat
analyzed: yadi tasya kvacid sidhyet siddham vastu balena tat

original: 04123 pratīti-siddha-upagame aśaśiny apy anivāraṇam
04124 tasya vastuni siddhasya śaśiny apy anivāraṇam
analyzed: tasya vastuni siddhasya śaśini api anivāraṇam

original: 04124 tad-vastv-abhāve śaśini vāraṇe api na duṣyati

original: 04125 tasmād avastu-niyata-saṃketa-dhvani-bhāvinām

original: 04125 yogyāḥ padārthā dharmāṇām icchāyā anirodhanāt

original: 04126 tāṃ yogyatāṃ nirundhānaṃ saṃketa-apratiṣedhajā
analyzed: tām yogya tām nirundhānam saṃketa a pratiṣedha jā

original: 04126 pratihanti pratīta-ākhyā yogyatā viṣayā anumā

original: 04127 śabdānām artha-niyamaḥ saṃketa-anuvidhāyinām
analyzed: śabdānām artha niyamaḥ saṃketa anuvidhāyinām

original: 04127 na ity anena uktam atra eṣāṃ pratiṣedho virudhyate
analyzed: na iti anena uktam atra eṣām pratiṣedhaḥ virudhyate

original: 04128 naimittikyāḥ śruter artham arthaṃ vā pāramārthikam
analyzed: naimittikyāḥ śruteḥ artham artham vā pāramārthikam

original: 04128 śabdānāṃ pratirundhāno na bādhyas tena varṇitaḥ
analyzed: śabdānām pratirundhānaḥ na bādhyaḥ tena varṇitaḥ

original: 04129 tasmād viṣaya-bhedasya darśanāya pṛthakkṛtā
analyzed: tasmāt viṣaya bhedasya darśanāya pṛthakkṛtā

original: 04129 anumāna-abahirbhūtā pratītir api pūrvavat
04130 siddhayoḥ pṛthag-ākhyāne darśayaṃś ca prayojanam
analyzed: siddhayoḥ pṛthak ākhyāne darśayan ca prayojanam

original: 04130 ete sahetuke prāha na anumā-adhyakṣa-bādhane

original: 04131 tatra apy adhyakṣa-bādhāyāṃ nānā-rūpatayā dhvanau

original: 04131 prasiddhasya śrutau rūpaṃ yad eva pratibhāsate

original: 04132 advayaṃ śabala-ābhāsasya adṛṣṭer buddhi-janmanaḥ

original: 04132 tad-artha-artha-uktir asya eva kṣepe adhyakṣeṇa bādhanam

original: 04133 tad eva rūpaṃ tatra arthaḥ śeṣaṃ vyāvṛtti-lakṣaṇam

original: 04133 avastu-rūpaṃ sāmānyam atas tan na akṣa-gocaraḥ
04134 tena sāmānya-dharmāṇāṃ apratyakṣatva-siddhitaḥ
analyzed: tena sāmānya dharmāṇām a pratyakṣa tva siddhitaḥ

original: 04134 pratikṣepe apy abādhā iti śrāvaṇa-uktyā prakāśitam
04135 sarvathā avācya-rūpatvāt siddhyā tasya samāśrayāt

original: 04135 bādhanāt tad-balena uktaḥ śravaṇena akṣa-gocaraḥ

original: 04136 sarvatra vādino dharmo yaḥ sva-sādhyatayā īpsitaḥ

original: 04136 tad dharmavati bādhā syān na anya-dharmeṇa dharmiṇi

original: 04137 anyathā asya uparodhaḥ ko bādhite anyatra dharmiṇi

original: 04137 gata-arthe lakṣaṇe na asmin sva-dharmi-vacanaṃ punaḥ

original: 04138 bādhāyāṃ dharmiṇo api syāt bādhā ity asya prasiddhaye

original: 04138 āśrayasya virodhena tad-āśrita-virodhanāt

original: 04139 tad bādhām eva manyeta sva-dharmi-vacanaṃ tataḥ

original: 04140 nanv etad apy artha-siddhaṃ satyaṃ kecit tu dharmiṇaḥ
analyzed: nanu etat api artha siddham satyam kecid tu dharmiṇaḥ

original: 04140 kevalasya uparodhe api doṣavat tām upāgatāḥ
analyzed: kevalasya uparodhe api doṣavat tām upāgatāḥ

original: 04141 yathā parair anutpādyā pūrva-rūpan na kha-ādikam

original: 04141 sakṛc śabda-ādy-ahetutvād ity ukte prāha dūṣakaḥ

original: 04142 tadvad vastu-svabhāvo asan dharmī vyoma-ādir ity api

analyzed: na evam iṣṭasya sādhyasya bādhā kvacana vidyate

original: 04143 dvayasya api hi sādhyatve sādhya-dharma-uparodhi yat

original: 04143 bādhanaṃ dharmiṇas tatra bādhā ity etena varṇitam

original: 04144 tathā eva dharmiṇo apy atra sādhyatvāt kevalasya na

original: 04145 sakṛc śabda-ādy-ahetutvāt sukha-ādir iti pūrvavat

original: 04145 virodhitā bhavet atra hetur aikāntiko yadi

original: 04146 krama-kriyā anityatayor avirodhād vipakṣataḥ
04146 vyāvṛtteḥ saṃśayād eṣa śeṣavad bheda iṣyate

original: 04147 svayam iṣṭo yato dharmaḥ sādhyas tasmāt tad-āśrayaḥ

original: 04147 bādhyo na kevalo na anya-saṃśrayo vā iti sūcitam

original: 04148 svayaṃ śrutyā anya-dharmāṇāṃ bādhā abādhā iti kathyate

original: 04148 tathā sva-dharmiṇā anyasya dharmiṇo api iti kathyate

original: 04149 sarva-sādhana-doṣeṇa pakṣa eva uparudhyate

original: 04149 tathā api pakṣa-doṣatvaṃ pratijñā-mātra-saṃjñinaḥ

original: 04150 uttara-avayava-apekṣo yo doṣaḥ so anubadhyate

original: 04151 dharmi-dharma-viśeṣāṇāṃ svarūpasya ca dharmiṇaḥ

original: 04151 bādhā-sādhya-aṅga-bhūtānām anena eva upadarśitā

original: 04152 tatra udāhṛti-diṅmātram ucyate arthasya dṛṣṭaye

original: 04152 dravya-lakṣaṇa-yukto anyaḥ saṃyoge artho asti dṛṣṭi-bhāk

original: 04153 adṛśyasya aviśiṣṭasya pratijñā niṣprayojanā

original: 04153 iṣṭo hy avayavī kāryaṃ dṛṣṭyā adṛśyeṣv asambhavī

original: 04154 aviśiṣṭasya ca anyasya sādhane siddha-sādhanam
analyzed: aviśiṣṭasya ca anyasya sādhane siddhasādhanam

original: 04154 gurutva-adhogatī syātāṃ yady asau syāt tulā-natiḥ
analyzed: gurutva adhogatī syātām yadi asau syāt tulā natiḥ

original: 04155 tan nirguṇa-kriyas tasmāt samavāyi na kāraṇam

original: 04155 tata eva na dṛśyo asāv adṛṣṭeḥ kārya-rūpayoḥ

original: 04156 tad-bādhā-anya-viśeṣasya nāntarīyaka-bhāvinaḥ

original: 04156 ā sūkṣmād dravyam ālāyās tulyatvād aṃśu-pāta-vat

original: 04157 dravya-antara-gurutvasya gatirn na ity aparo abravīt
analyzed: dravya antara guru tvasya gatiḥ naḥ iti aparaḥ abravīt

original: 04157 tasya krameṇa saṃyukte pāṃśu-rāśau sakṛd yute
analyzed: tasya krameṇa saṃyukte pāṃśu rāśau sakṛt yute

original: 04158 bhedaḥ syād gaurave tasmāt pṛthak saha ca tolite
analyzed: bhedaḥ syāt gaurave tasmāt pṛthak saha ca tolite

original: 04158 krameṇa māṣaka-ādīnāṃ saṃkhyā-sāmyaṃ na yujyate

original: 04159 sarṣapād ā mahā-rāśer uttarottara-vṛddhimat
analyzed: sarṣapāt ā mahārāśeḥ uttara uttara vṛddhimat

original: 04159 gurutvaṃ kāryam ālāya yadi na eva upalakṣyate
analyzed: guru tvam kāryam ālāya yadi na eva upalakṣyate

original: 04160 ā sarṣapād gurutvaṃ tad durlakṣitam analpakam
analyzed: ā sarṣapāt guru tvam tat durlakṣitam analpakam

original: 04160 taulyaṃ tat-kāraṇaṃ kārya-gaurava-anupalakṣaṇāt
analyzed: taulyam tat kāraṇam kārya gaurava anupalakṣaṇāt

original: 04161 nanv adṛṣṭo aṃśu-vat so artho na ca tat-kāryam īkṣyate
analyzed: nanu adṛṣṭaḥ aṃśu vat saḥ arthaḥ na ca tad kāryam īkṣyate

original: 04161 gurutva-agati-vat sarva-tad-guṇa-anupalakṣaṇāt
analyzed: guru tva agati vat sarva tad guṇa anupalakṣaṇāt

original: 04162 māṣaka-āder anādhikyam anatiḥ sā upalakṣaṇam
04162 yathāsvam akṣeṇa adṛṣṭe rūpa-ādāv adhika-adhike
analyzed: yathāsvam akṣeṇa adṛṣṭe rūpa ādau adhika adhike

original: 04163 abhyupāyaḥ sva-vāg-ādi-bādhāyāḥ sambhavena tu
analyzed: abhyupāyaḥ sva vāc ādi bādhāyāḥ sambhavena tu

original: 04163 udāharaṇam apy anyad diśā gamyam yathoktayā
analyzed: udāharaṇam api anyat diśā gamyam yathā uktayā

original: 04164 tri-kāla-viṣayatvāt tu kṛtyānām atathātmakam
analyzed: tri kāla viṣaya tvāt tu kṛtyānām atathātmakam

original: 04164 tathā param pratinyastam sādhyaṃ na iṣṭaṃ tadā api tat
analyzed: tathā param pratinyastam sādhyam na iṣṭam tadā api tat

original: 04165 pratyāyana-adhikāre tu sarva-asiddha-avarodhinī
analyzed: pratyāyana adhikāre tu sarva asiddha avarodhinī

original: 04165 tasmāt sādhya-śrutirn na iṣṭaṃ viśeṣam avalambate
analyzed: tasmāt sādhya śrutiḥ na iṣṭam viśeṣam avalambate

original: 04166 tena aprasiddha-dṛṣṭānta-hetu-udāharaṇaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: tena aprasiddha dṛṣṭānta hetu udāharaṇam kṛtam

original: 04166 anyathā śaśa-śṛṅga-ādau sarva-asiddhe api sādhyatā
analyzed: anyathā śaśaśṛṅga ādau sarva asiddhe api sādhya tā

original: 04167 sarvasya ca aprasiddhatvāt kathaṃcit tena na kṣamaḥ
analyzed: sarvasya ca aprasiddha tvāt kathaṃcid tena na kṣamaḥ

original: 04167 karma-ādi-bheda-upakṣepa-parihāra-avivecane
analyzed: karma ādi bheda aupakṣepa parihāra avivecane

original: 04168 prāg-asiddha-svabhāvatvāt sādhya-avayava ity asat
analyzed: prāk asiddha svabhāva tvāt sādhya avayavaḥ iti asat

original: 04168 tulya-siddhāntatā te hi yena upagama-lakṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: tulya siddhānta tā te hi yena upagama lakṣaṇāḥ

original: 04169 samudāyasya sādhyatve apy anyonyasya viśeṣaṇam
analyzed: samudāyasya sādhya tve api anyonyasya viśeṣaṇam

original: 04169 sādhyaṃ dvayaṃ tadā asiddhaṃ hetu-dṛṣṭānta-lakṣaṇam

original: 04170 asambhavāt sādhya-śabdo dharmi-vṛttir yadi iṣyate

original: 04170 śāstreṇa alaṃ yathāyogaṃ loka eva pravartatām
analyzed: śāstreṇa alam yathāyogam lokaḥ eva pravartatām

original: 04171 sādhana-ākhyāna-sāmarthyāt tad-arthe sādhyatā gatā
analyzed: sādhana ākhyāna sāmarthyāt tad arthe sādhya tā gatā

original: 04171 hetv-ādi-lakṣaṇair vyāpter anāśaṅkyaṃ ca sādhanam

original: 04172 pūrva-avadhāraṇe tena pratijñā-lakṣaṇa-abhidhā
analyzed: pūrva avadhāraṇe tena pratijñā lakṣaṇa abhidhā

original: 04172 vyarthā vyāpti-phalā sā uktiḥ sāmarthyād gamyate tataḥ
analyzed: vyarthā vyāpti phalā sā uktiḥ sāmarthyāt gamyate tatas

original: 04173 viruddhatā iṣṭa-asambandho anupakāra-sahāsthitī
analyzed: viruddha tā iṣṭa asambandhaḥ anupakāra saha āsthitī

original: 04173 evaṃ sarva-aṅga-doṣāṇāṃ pratijñā-doṣatā bhavet

original: 04174 pakṣa-doṣaḥ para-apekṣo na iti ca pratipāditam

original: 04174 iṣṭa-asambhavy-asiddhaś ca sa eva syāt nirākṛtaḥ

original: 04175 anityatva-sahetutve śabda evaṃ prakīrtayet
04175 dṛṣṭānta-ākhyān ato anyat kim asty atra artha-anudarśanam
analyzed: atas anyat kim asti atra artha anudarśanam

original: 04176 viśeṣe bhinnam ākhyāya sāmānyasya anuvartane
analyzed: viśeṣe bhinnam ākhyāya sāmānyasya anuvartane

original: 04176 na tad-vyāpteḥ phalaṃ vā kiṃ sāmānyena anuvartane
analyzed: na tad vyāpteḥ phalam vā kim sāmānyena anuvartane

original: 04177 syān nirākaraṇaṃ śabde sthitena eva ity ato abravīt

original: 04177 viruddha-viṣaye anyasmin vadann āha anyatāṃ śruteḥ

original: 04178 sā ca bheda-apratikṣepāt sāmānyānāṃ na vidyate
analyzed: sā ca bheda a pratikṣepāt sāmānyānām na vidyate

original: 04178 vṛkṣo na śiṃśapā eva iti yathā prakaraṇe kvacit
analyzed: vṛkṣaḥ na śiṃśapā eva iti yathā prakaraṇe kvacid

original: 04179 sarva-śruter eka-vṛttirn niṣedhaḥ syān na tāvatā
analyzed: sarva śruteḥ eka vṛttiḥ niṣedhaḥ syāt na tāvatā

original: 04180 jñāpya-jñāpakayor bhedād dharmiṇo hetu-bhāvinaḥ
analyzed: jñāpya jñāpakayoḥ bhedāt dharmiṇaḥ hetu bhāvinaḥ

original: 04180 asiddher jñāpakatvasya dharmy-asiddhaḥ sva-sādhane

original: 04181 dharma-dharmi-vivekasya sarva-bhāveṣv asiddhitaḥ

original: 04181 sarvatra doṣas tulyaś cen na saṃvṛtyā viśeṣataḥ
analyzed: sarvatra doṣaḥ tulyaḥ ced na saṃvṛtyā viśeṣataḥ

original: 04182 paramārtha-vicāreṣu tathābhūta-prasiddhitaḥ
04182 tattvānyatvaṃ padārtheṣu sāṃvṛteṣu niṣidhyate
analyzed: tattva anyatvam padārtheṣu sāṃvṛteṣu niṣidhyate

original: 04183 anumāna-anumeya-artha-vyavahāra-sthitis tv iyam
analyzed: anumāna anumeya artha vyavahāra sthitiḥ tu iyam

original: 04183 bhedaṃ pratyaya-saṃsiddham avalambya ca kalpyate
analyzed: bhedam pratyaya saṃsiddham avalambya ca kalpyate

original: 04184 yathāsvaṃ bheda-niṣṭheṣu pratyayeṣu vivekinaḥ
analyzed: yathāsvam bheda niṣṭheṣu pratyayeṣu vivekinaḥ

original: 04184 dharmī dharmāś ca bhāsante vyavahāras tad-āśrayaḥ
analyzed: dharmī dharmāḥ ca bhāsante vyavahāraḥ tad āśrayaḥ

original: 04185 vyavahāra-upanīto atra sa eva aśliṣṭa-bheda-dhīḥ
analyzed: vyavahāra aupanītaḥ atra saḥ eva aśliṣṭa bheda dhīḥ

original: 04185 sādhyaḥ sādhanatāṃ nītas tena asiddhaḥ prakāśitaḥ
analyzed: sādhyaḥ sādhana tām nītaḥ tena asiddhaḥ prakāśitaḥ

original: 04186 bheda-sāmānyayor dharma-bhedād aṅga-aṅgitā tataḥ
04186 yathā anityaḥ prayatna-utthaḥ prayatna-utthatayā dhvaniḥ
analyzed: yathā anityaḥ prayatna otthaḥ prayatna ottha tayā dhvaniḥ

original: 04187 pakṣa-aṅgatve apy abādhatvān na asiddhir bhinna-dharmiṇi
04187 yathā aśvo na viṣāṇitvād eṣa piṇḍo viṣāṇavān
analyzed: yathā aśvaḥ na viṣāṇi tvāt eṣa piṇḍaḥ viṣāṇavān

original: 04188 sādhya-kāla-aṅgatā vā na nivṛtter upalakṣya tat

original: 04188 viśeṣo api pratijñā-artho dharma-bhedān na yujyate

original: 04189 pakṣa-dharma-prabhedena sukha-grahaṇa-siddhaye
analyzed: pakṣa dharma prabhedena sukha grahaṇa siddhaye

original: 04189 hetu-prakaraṇa-arthasya sūtra-saṃkṣepa ucyate

original: 04190 ayogaṃ yogam aparair atyantāyogam eva ca
analyzed: ayogam yogam aparaiḥ atyanta ayogam eva ca

original: 04190 vyavacchinatti dharmasya nipāto vyatirecakaḥ
analyzed: vyavacchinatti dharmasya nipātaḥ vyatirecakaḥ

original: 04191 viśeṣaṇa-viśeṣyābhyāṃ kriyayā ca sahoditaḥ
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyābhyām kriyayā ca saha uditaḥ

original: 04191 vivakṣāto prayoge api tasya artho ayaṃ pratīyate
analyzed: prayoge api tasya arthaḥ ayam pratīyate

original: 04192 vyavaccheda-phalaṃ vākyaṃ yataś caitro dhanurdharaḥ

original: 04192 pārtho dhanurdharo nīlaṃ sarojam iti vā yathā

original: 04193 pratiyogi-vyavacchedas tatra apy artheṣu gamyate
04193 tathā prasiddheḥ sāmarthyād vivakṣā-anugamād dhvaneḥ
analyzed: tathā prasiddheḥ sāmarthyāt vivakṣā anugamāt dhvaneḥ

original: 04194 tad ayogavyavacchedād dharmi-dharma-viśeṣaṇam
04194 tad-viśiṣṭatayā dharmo na niranvaya-doṣa-bhāk
analyzed: tad viśiṣṭa tayā dharmaḥ na niranvaya doṣa bhāj

original: 04195 svabhāva-kārya-siddhy-arthaṃ dvau dvau hetu-viparyayau
analyzed: svabhāva kārya siddhi artham dvau dvau hetu viparyayau

original: 04195 vivādād bheda-sāmānye śeṣo vyāvṛtti-sādhanaḥ
04196 na hi svabhāvād anyena vyāptir gamyasya kāraṇe
analyzed: na hi svabhāvāt anyena vyāptiḥ gamyasya kāraṇe

original: 04196 sambhavād vyabhicārasya dvidhā vṛtti-phalaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: sambhavāt vyabhicārasya dvidhā vṛtti phalam tatas

original: 04197 prayatnānantaraṃ jñānaṃ prāk sato niyamena na
analyzed: prayatna anantaram jñānam prāk sataḥ niyamena na

original: 04197 tasya āvṛtty-akṣa-śabdeṣu sarvathā anupayogataḥ
analyzed: tasya āvṛtti akṣa śabdeṣu sarvathā anupayogataḥ

original: 04198 kadācin nirapekṣasya kārya-ākṛti-virodhataḥ
analyzed: kadācid nirapekṣasya kārya ākṛti virodhataḥ

original: 04198 kādācitka-phalaṃ siddhaṃ tal-liṅgaṃ jñānam īdṛśam
analyzed: kādācitka phalam siddham tad liṅgam jñānam īdṛśam

original: 04199 etena eva prasiddho api svabhāvasya pṛthak kṛtiḥ
analyzed: etena eva prasiddhaḥ api svabhāvasya pṛthak kṛtiḥ

original: 04199 kāryeṇa saha nirdeśe mā jñāsīt sarvam īdṛśam
analyzed: kāryeṇa saha nirdeśe mā jñāsīt sarvam īdṛśam

original: 04200 vyutpatty-arthī ca hetu-uktir ukta-artha-anumitau kṛtā
analyzed: vyutpatti arthī ca hetu uktiḥ ukta artha anumitau kṛtā

original: 04200 prabheda-mātram ākhyātaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tu na bhidyate
analyzed: prabheda mātram ākhyātam lakṣaṇam tu na bhidyate

original: 04201 tena atra kārya-liṅgena svabhāvo apy ekadeśa-bhāk
analyzed: tena atra kārya liṅgena svabhāvaḥ api eka deśa bhāj

original: 04201 sadṛśa-udāhṛtiś ca ataḥ prayatnād vyakti-janmanaḥ
04202 yan nāntarīyakā sattā yo vā ātmā svo avibhāgavān
analyzed: yat nāntarīyakā sattā yaḥ vai ātmā svaḥ a vibhāgavān

original: 04202 sa tena avyabhicārī syād ity arthaṃ tat prabhedanam

original: 04203 saṃyogy-ādiṣu yeṣv asti pratibandho na tādṛśam

original: 04203 na te hetava ity uktaṃ vyabhicārasya sambhavāt
analyzed: na te hetavaḥ iti uktam vyabhicārasya sambhavāt

original: 04204 sati vā pratibandhes tu sa eva gati-sādhanaḥ
analyzed: sati vā pratibandheḥ tu saḥ eva gati sādhanaḥ

original: 04204 niyamo hy avinābhāvo anityaś ca na sādhanam
analyzed: niyamaḥ hi avinābhāvaḥ anityaḥ ca na sādhanam

original: 04205 aikāntikatvaṃ vyāvṛtter avinābhāva ucyate
analyzed: aikāntika tvam vyāvṛtteḥ avinābhāvaḥ ucyate

original: 04205 tac ca na apratibaddheṣu tata eva anvaya-sthitiḥ
analyzed: tat ca na apratibaddheṣu tatas eva anvaya sthitiḥ

original: 04206 svātmatve hetu-bhāve vā siddhe hi vyatirekitā
analyzed: sva ātma tve hetu bhāve vā siddhe hi vyatireki tā

original: 04206 sidhyaty ato viśeṣe na vyatireko na ca anvayaḥ

original: 04207 adṛṣṭi-mātram ādāya kevalaṃ vyatirekitā
analyzed: adṛṣṭi mātram ādāya kevalam vyatireki tā

original: 04207 uktā anaikāntikas tasmād anyathā gamako bhavet
analyzed: uktāḥ anaikāntikaḥ tasmāt anyathā gamakaḥ bhavet

original: 04208 prāṇa-ādy-abhāvo nairātmya-vyāptī iti vinivartane
analyzed: prāṇa ādi abhāvaḥ nairātmya vyāptī iti vinivartane

original: 04208 ātmano vinivarteta prāṇa-ādir yadi tac ca na

original: 04209 anyasya vinivṛttyā anya-vinivṛtter ayogataḥ
analyzed: anyasya vinivṛttyāḥ anya vinivṛtteḥ ayogataḥ

original: 04209 tadātmā tat-prasūtaś cen na etad ātma-upalambhane

original: 04210 tasya upalabdhāv agatāv agatau ca prasidhyati
analyzed: tasya upalabdhau agatau agatau ca prasidhyati

original: 04210 te ca atyantaparokṣasya dṛṣṭy-adṛṣṭī na sidhyataḥ
analyzed: te ca atyanta parokṣasya dṛṣṭi adṛṣṭī na sidhyataḥ

original: 04211 anyatra adṛṣṭa-rūpasya ghaṭa-ādau na iti vā kutaḥ
analyzed: anyatra adṛṣṭa rūpasya ghaṭa ādau na iti vā kutas

original: 04211 ajñāta-vyatirekasya vyāvṛtter vyāpitā kutaḥ
analyzed: ajñāta vyatirekasya vyāvṛtteḥ vyāpi tā kutas

original: 04212 prāṇa-ādeś ca kvacid dṛṣṭyā sattva-asattvaṃ pratīyate
analyzed: prāṇa ādeḥ ca kvacid dṛṣṭyā sattva asattvam pratīyate

original: 04212 tathā ātmā yadi dṛśyeta sattva-asattvaṃ pratīyate
analyzed: tathā ātmā yadi dṛśyeta sattva asattvam pratīyate

original: 04213 yasya hetor abhāvena ghaṭe prāṇo na dṛśyate
analyzed: yasya hetoḥ abhāvena ghaṭe prāṇaḥ na dṛśyate

original: 04213 dehe api yady asau na syād yukto dehena sambhavaḥ
analyzed: dehe api yadi asau na syāt yuktaḥ dehena sambhavaḥ

original: 04214 bhinne api kiṃcit sādharmyād yadi tattvaṃ pratīyate
analyzed: bhinne api kiṃcid sādharmyāt yadi tattvam pratīyate

original: 04214 prameyatvād ghaṭa-ādīnāṃ sātmatvaṃ kiṃ na mīyate
analyzed: na

original: 04215 aniṣṭaṃ cet pramāṇaṃ hi sarva-iṣṭīnāṃ nibandhanam
analyzed: aniṣṭam ced pramāṇam hi sarva aiṣṭīnām nibandhanam

original: 04215 bhāva-abhāva-vyavasthāṃ kaḥ kartuṃ tena vinā prabhuḥ
analyzed: bhāva abhāva vyavasthām kaḥ kartum tena vinā prabhuḥ

original: 04216 smṛti-icchā-yatnajaḥ prāṇa-nimeṣa-ādis tad-udbhavaḥ
04216 viṣaya-indriya-cittibhyas tāḥ sva-jāti-samudbhavāḥ
analyzed: viṣaya aindriya cittibhyaḥ tāḥ sva jāti samudbhavāḥ

original: 04217 anyonya-pratyaya-apekṣā anvaya-vyatireka-bhāk
04217 etāv atyātmabhāvo ayam anavasthā-anya-kalpane
analyzed: etau ati ātma bhāvaḥ ayam anavasthā anya kalpane

original: 04218 śrāvaṇatvena tat-tulyaṃ prāṇa-ādi-vyabhicārataḥ
analyzed: śrāvaṇa tvena tat tulyam prāṇa ādi vyabhicārataḥ

original: 04218 na tasya vyabhicāritvād vyatireke api cet katham
analyzed: na tasya vyabhicāri tvāt vyatireke api ced katham

original: 04219 na asādhyād eva viśleṣas tasya nanv evam ucyate
analyzed: na asādhyāt eva viśleṣaḥ tasya nanu evam ucyate

original: 04219 sādhye anuvṛtty-abhāvo arthāt tasya anyatra apy asau samaḥ
analyzed: sādhye anuvṛtti abhāvaḥ arthāt tasya anyatra api asau samaḥ

original: 04220 asādhyād eva viccheda iti sādhye astitā ucyate
analyzed: asādhyāt eva vicchedaḥ iti sādhye astitā ucyate

original: 04220 arthāpattyā ata eva uktam ekena dvaya-darśanam
analyzed: arthāpattyā atas eva uktam ekena dvaya darśanam

original: 04221 īdṛg-avyabhicāro ato ananvayeṣu na sidhyati
analyzed: īdṛś avyabhicāraḥ atas ananvayeṣu na sidhyati

original: 04221 pratiṣedha-niṣedhaś ca vidhānāt kīdṛśo aparaḥ
analyzed: pratiṣedha niṣedhaḥ ca vidhānāt kīdṛśaḥ aparaḥ

original: 04222 nivṛttirn na asataḥ sādhyād asādhyeṣv eva no tataḥ
analyzed: nivṛttiḥ na asataḥ sādhyāt asādhyeṣu eva no tatas

original: 04222 na iti sā eva nivṛttiḥ kiṃ nivṛtter asato matā
analyzed: na iti sā eva nivṛttiḥ kim nivṛtteḥ asataḥ matā

original: 04223 nivṛtty-abhāvas tu vidhir vastu-bhāvo asato api san
analyzed: nivṛtti abhāvaḥ tu vidhiḥ vastu bhāvaḥ asataḥ api san

original: 04223 vastv-abhāvas tu na asti iti paśya bāndhya-vijṛmbhitam
analyzed: vastu abhāvaḥ tu na asti iti paśya bāndhya vijṛmbhitam

original: 04224 nivṛttir yadi tasmin na hetor vṛttiḥ kiṃ niṣidhyate
analyzed: nivṛttiḥ yadi tasmin na hetoḥ vṛttiḥ kim niṣidhyate

original: 04224 sā api na pratiṣedho ayaṃ nivṛttiḥ kiṃ niṣidhyate
analyzed: sā api na pratiṣedhaḥ ayam nivṛttiḥ kim niṣidhyate

original: 04225 vidhānaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ ca muktvā śābdo asti na aparaḥ
analyzed: vidhānam pratiṣedham ca muktvā śābdaḥ asti na aparaḥ

original: 04225 vyavahāraḥ sa ca asatsu na iti prāptā atra mūkatā
analyzed: vyavahāraḥ sa ca asatsu na iti prāptā atra mūka tā

original: 04226 satāṃ ca na niṣedho asti so asatsu ca na vidyate
analyzed: satām ca na niṣedhaḥ asti saḥ asatsu ca na vidyate

original: 04226 jagaty anena nyāyena nañ-arthaḥ pralayaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: jagati anena nyāyena nañ arthaḥ pralayam gataḥ

original: 04227 deśa-kāla-niṣedhaś ced yathā asti sa niṣidhyate
